characters: DAD.. A VERSE LATER ARJUN JOINS IN AND EVENTUALLY AT THE
RAHUL STRUMS THE GUITAR AND STARTS SINGING A SONG FOR GRA
CHORUS THE WHOLE PARTY SINGS ALONG.
SOUND OF THE JET TRANSPORTS US INTO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WIPERS on a windscreen move back and forth. Our view blurred by the RAIN, A Phone RINGS. We SEE a strong headl approaching from the left. And then: A TRUCK comes CRASHING into the car from the si making it violently propel out of frame. Before we know w in it... FADE OUT. EXT. KAPOOR’S FAMILY HOUSE - MORNING An old, not the most well maintained yet a charming singl storey bungalow with a lawn in front. Legend: 10 days earlier. Coonoor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fly buzzes past a bowl of cereal. We follow a spoon up an OLD MAN’s mouth. We can hear the cereal CRUNCH.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I'm old. Bald. My toenails have turned strange. But life isn’t all that bad. This is GRAND DAD. He sits at the dining table and looks few FAMILY PHOTOGRAPHS hung on the wall in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I often wonder when I die, would it bring about any change in anyone’s life? Or am I just another ordinary soul passing through time? He throws a piece of bread to his dog - GEISHU, the dog catches it mid air and gulps it down. The fly now buzzes close to the dog’s face.. He looks at anxiously..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: If I live another 7 days, I will be 90.. (beat) Most would feel that that’s an awfully long life to live.. and maybe it is, but who cares? I just want to enjoy it before I go up in fiery red flames and dirty black smoke... ‘Cause in the end (beat) .-in this uncertain life, only one thing is certain--  2. The dog catches the fly and Grandad’s head drops down ont the breakfast table with a THUMP. The dog spits out the fly. DEAD. Grandfather’s son HARISH (late 50's) and daughter-in-law SUNITA (mid 50’s) who have been sitting right opposite hi stop their morning chores. Their reaction is under-whelmi

dialogues.speaker: SUNITA
dialogues.text: (calls out casually) Dharmendar, khana utha lo! DHARMENDAR, their servant comes and clears Grand dad’s pl

dialogues.speaker: SUNITA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur suno.. aloo ubal gaye honge toh yahaan le aana. Bathroom saaf kiya? (Dharmendar shakes head) Phenyl daala? Harish gets back to sorting his account papers and Sunita back to slicing vegetables. Grand dad opens his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Kai dinon se marne ki practice kar raha hoon. Rehearsal achchi hogi, toh professionally marunga! Waise bhi maut, life mein ek hi baar aati hai. Grand dad gets up and elegantly cleans his face. Then wit the help of his walker heads to his room.

dialogues.speaker: SUNITA
dialogues.text: Paper chhod kar inpe thoda dhyan doge? Ek hafte se bus marne ki rehearsal kar rahe hain.

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: (busy scrambling through bills) --Ab is umar mein kya samjhaun? Aur ye bhindi account papers pe.. Hatao yaar, Saara masala lag raha hai!

dialogues.speaker: SUNITA
dialogues.text: (mumbles ) Bus Account papers hi hain, paise kab aaenge bhagavan jaane..

dialogues.speaker: HARISH
dialogues.text: Jab tum taane marna band karogi na toh apne aap aa jayeinge.. (looks at a bill) Aur ye kya hai.. 6700 rupay bijli ka bill.. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Din mein hazaar baar bolta hun tv ko main switch se band karo..

dialogues.speaker: SUNITA
dialogues.text: Haan, ghar se light pankhe niklva dete hain, bijli ka bill aayega hi nahin! (segue) Plumber ko bulaya? (he doesn’t react) Teen din se bathroom leek kara raha hai.. Magar jab tak ghar swimming pool nahin ban jata tumhein kya farak padta hai.. A LOUD THUD...

dialogues.speaker: SUNITA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Phir se.. Dharmendar! Jaake dekho! The dog senses something wrong, he walks to the corridor sniffs Grand dad’s body lying on the floor. Is he dead th time?

dialogues.speaker: SUNITA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Parson chaati par tumator ka sauce laga ke lawn mein so gaye thhe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Rahul’s AGENT and him at a cafe. Mid-conversation.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: What? Say something..

dialogues.speaker: AGENT
dialogues.text: What do you want me to say? What should I tell the publisher? The deadline is two months and I haven’t read a word of this novel you've been writing for 8 months.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (totally lying) Yeah, yeah. It’s almost done.

dialogues.speaker: AGENT
dialogues.text: So Share it, I’ll make my notes.  A beat.. He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (scrambling) I just need to revise some small bits. Ending needs to change, got to fix some plot points. I’m on it.

dialogues.speaker: AGENT
dialogues.text: Ya right..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Just this Artist retreat business plan has kept me a bit busy.

dialogues.speaker: AGENT
dialogues.text: (knowingly) Listen, I know this artist retreat plan is exciting and that you can multi task but for a moment I have to be your agent and not your friend.. (beat) You are hot property right now. Your last book is still on the shelves.. We’ve got a good price for this book.. If we miss the deadline we'll have to return the advance.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yep.. I get it. I'll share it with you in the next 20 days..

dialogues.speaker: AGENT
dialogues.text: Okay.. And here.. (pulls out a few copies of the last novel) Just sign these.. need to send them out to some friends who love your work.. can’t figure out why!?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Be nice! - Phone RINGS. It says Dad. He answers it.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hello. (face starts to fall) Shit.. Don’t worry main Arjun ko phont karta hun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Phone, a pack of cigarettes and two tiny speakers lie n to an ashtray. The Phone rings, screen shows - Rahul. Arjun, late 20’s, with his towel wrapped around his waist steps out of the shower and picks up the phone, checks it then continues to let it ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s a cramped - one bedroom apartment, cluttered with th paraphernalia of daily living. A whole lot of books and a white board lay against a wall with lot of notes written over it and at the bottom it says - PITCH PITCH PITCH!! “ the Publisher”. Arjun’s holding the phone to his ear. It keeps ringing. T call goes onto voice mail. From his expression we know it not the first time he’s being ignored by the publisher. INT. RAHUL’S APARTMENT - LONDON - NIGHT It’s a two bedroom apartment, systematically organized - WRITER'S TABLE, BOOKS, LAPTOP and a GUITAR. Rahul’s packi his luggage as he talks into the phone, pinned shoulder-t ear.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Pachaas baar phone kar chuka hoon. Phone kyun nahin utha raha? INT. ARJUN’S APARTMENT - NIGHT Arjun sits next to his computer screen and eats his to-go meal as he talks over the phone. The conversation INTERCU between the two:

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kyun, kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Papa called, Dadu got a heart attack. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Shit ! Is he okay?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ab stable hain, magar ICU main hain..  11 12

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Unhone mujhe phone kyun nahi kiya?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arjun, in baaton ke liye time nahin hai... Maine saare flights check kiye hain, sirf Air India ki direct flight hai. Waheen lekar parsoe chaar baje pahunch raha hoon. Tum agar kal New Jersey se 7:40 ki flight lelo, toh hum dono airport se saath nikal sakte hain.
Arjun quickly taps on the keyboard nearby to check ticket prices, they seem way too expensive.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gimme a sec.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Tumhare liye ticket khareed loon?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Koi zarurat nahin. Main manage kar lunga. Arjun cuts his call. A beat and then he clicks “buy ticke

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun stands in front of the conveyer belt with just one small luggage going around. It’s not his. He leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun stands at the privileged lounge entrance.

dialogues.speaker: LOUNGE ATTENDANT
dialogues.text: I'll just call him, sir. Arjun waits outside awkwardly as a bunch of business clas passengers by-pass him to enter. After a moment or two, h sees Rahul walk up to him.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Hey..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Hey.. They meet in an awkward way, it’s something between a hug a hand shake. An uncomfortable moment or two. Then as the walk:  13 14 15 16 17

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Where’s your Luggage? Before we hear Arjun’s answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two brothers sit quietly inside the cab like stranger an airport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cab stops outside the Kapoor’s House. The brothers ge off and walk towards the house.

dialogues.speaker: I/E. HOUSE
dialogues.text: It’s locked. They’ve reached before the parents have.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (on the phone) Kahaan ho aap log? Haan, hum toh pahunch gaye... Kahaan? He lifts up the foot-mat and picks up the key, opens the to find their dog ‘Geishu’ jumping up and down with excitement. They playfully pet him. (ad-lib dialogues) The dog excitedly follows them around as they head to the respective rooms. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM: Rahul inspects all the things he had left behind - his bo a broken guitar, and his secret audio casette case in whi couple of stale cigarettes lie wrapped in a newspaper. He steps out. Arjun pops his head into Rahul’s room to see that nothing changed at all. Miffed, he goes back to his room. Rahul follows. DOOR BELL RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul opens the door, the parents enter. (Ad-lib, Greetin and Pecks and some small comments on each other’s changed The following conversation is quick and characters talk o each others dialogues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How’s dadu?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Better hain par do-teen din aur observation mein rahenge...

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Ab umar ho gayi hai beta..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Abhi mil sakte hain?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Nahin, visting hours khatam ho gaye hain--

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tum dono subeh chale jaana.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: --Aaj raat main wahaan reh loonga.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Chachu kab aa rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Unse contact hi nahi kar pa rahe..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arrey woh do hafte ki chutti pe cruise pe gaya hai aur ab contact nahin ho pa raha..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Pata nahin kb netwrok lagega.. Tum dono ko bhookh lagi hai? Dinner is ready. (notices some shoe marks) Oh god! Kisne floor mat par joote saaf nahin kiye?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (points to his socks) Not me maa. Arjun looks down and notices his shoes are mucky then he Geishu next to him.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Geishu, kya kar raha hai, sab kuch ganda kar diya.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Very funny Arjun, rules nahin badle...  18 19

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Welcome back home! Arjun enters the KITCHEN, opens the dish his mom has brou in.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (dejected) Bhindi?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (to Arjun) Sorry, hadbadi mein rajma bhigona bhool gayi. Par tumhara favorite nimbu achaar hai na! Arjun makes a face, turns around and heads to the bathroo Mum realizes he’s agitated. Rahul opens the dish, eats a bhindi.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Love it!! Thanks Ma.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun looks at his old bathroom which now has a floral sh curtain. He hates it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are mid meal. Mother’s trying to fetch something fro drawer. ON TV: A terrible hindi film plays on Zee Tv. Father’s making himself a night-cap.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Creative logon ke kaam karne ke liye ek shaant jagah..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yep.. Artist retreat.. Investors bhi almost ready hain..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Aur novel kaisi chal rahi hai?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Uspe thoda.. actually kaafi kaam baki hai.. Mum brings in custard..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Pata nahin tu itna saara kaam kaise sambhalta hai. Here try this.. Sab ke liye custard banaya hai.. Arjun try it..  10.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (takes a bite) Maa, this is so tasty..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Accha hai na.. Timmy maasi ki recipe hai.. (to rahul and arjun) Woh toh chahti hai uski tarah main bhi Coonoor mein catering business start kar loon. Mujhe train bhi kar legi woh. Aur recipes itne achche hain, order pe order aate rehte hain..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Itna bhi khaas nahin hai..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Jitna tum pure saal mein kamate ho na woh teen mahine mein kamati hai.. toh tumhare khaas lagne na lagne se kuch farak nahin padta

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (re: Arjun) Kya chal raha hai bhai? Jab se aaye ho phone pe ho -- (beat) Tuhara woh website ka kaam kaisa chal raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nahin, woh pichle mahine chhod diya maine..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Ye bhi chhod diya? wah bhai..Ab?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ab khud ke liye likh raha hun..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Humse ek baar baat kar leta.. Aisa decision..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Papa aapko mere kaam ke baare mein kuch toh pata nahin hai.. Toh main kya pocchta..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Rahul se toh pooch sakta tha na..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Aap log mere kaam mein mat ghuso yaar..  20 He leaves. 11.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: It’s okay..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Mat ghuso matlab--

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: --Harish !

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: --Kya Harish? Ek ke baad ek job badalta rehta hai..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Bas karo Harish ---

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Is se baat karne ka koi faayda nain hai--

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Taane hi marne the toh khana kamre mein de dete.. Oh sorry.. Mera toh kamra hi nahin hai..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kuch hi dinon ke liye toh aaye hain .-Kya farak padta hai Arjun -- tu mere kamre mein so ja yaar.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: I’1l manage.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Beta mere back mein problem thi toh doctor ne bola hard mattress pe so.. toh, main tumhare room mein shift ho gayi.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Wah! Naukari badalte wagt toh poocha nhain.. Magar kamra badal diya toh..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father enters the kitchen with some utensils, puts them i the sink and runs the tap over them.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Main wapis hospital jaa raha hun. Rahul steps in..  21 22 23 12.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa, main dieting pe hun, mere liye green tea please.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Haan, okay beta.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ek aur baat.. (he pulls something out of his pocket) Ye aapke liye.. It’s a beautiful pair of earrings.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Oh.. You are just.. Mera perfect baccha. -- OMIT -—-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun walks up to the couch with his pillow to see Geishu already sitting on it.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kya? The dog puts his paw on the couch to claim territory.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Saale tu toh meri kuch izzat kar le.. chal aaja share karte hain.. 70-30.. Ok fine... 50 50.. Don’t push it. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - MORNING Rahul steps out of his bathroom, he’s got his i-Pad and h earphones on. He’s talking to someone over Skype and sipp green tea.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ya.. He’s better... I’11 meet him tomorrow... (beat) Ya I miss you too --- The door opens and Arjun is about to enter.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dude, darwaza band ho, toh knock karte hain.  13. Arjun knocks on the door and asks...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yes, Arjun.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Mum ne kahan, mere purane kapde tumhare cupboard mein rakhe hain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul rides shotgun, he scribbles on a small writer’s not pad. Arjun(in Rahul’s clothes) steers the car with one ha with the other attempts to fix the car’s tape recorder, paying little attention to the road.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom ne kahaa thha ki woh tere room mein mattress ki wajah se shift hui hain, par dono kamron mein same mattress hai.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (mocking) Whaaat? Dono kamron mein same mattress! Ab kya hoga Sherlock?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Shut up Arjun. Mom aur dad alag kamron mein so rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dad ke saath paintees saal bita le, tu bhi alag kamre mein soega. Arjun’s distracted with the tape recorder - A BIG BUMP!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Tu tape-recorder chhod kar sadak pe dhyaan de.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Itna dar lag raha hai toh khud gaadi chalana seekh le na.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aati hai mujhe.. I’m just not comfortable driving. 26 The car comes and stops at a toll booth. A LANKY MAN s the booth, Rahul passes him 50 bucks and in return gets 1 rupees and a lollipop.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ye kya hai bhai sahab?  25 14.

dialogues.speaker: LANKY MAN
dialogues.text: Chutta nahin hai sir.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Toh?

dialogues.speaker: LANKY MAN
dialogues.text: Toh 23 ka toll aur 7 ka Lollipop.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: What the-- The sheer ridiculousness of this deal makes them break in chuckle. Rahul notes this down in his notebook, Arjun not this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grand dad's throwing a shit-fit at the nurse about his scrubs.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Tum samajhte kyun nahin, iska plan hai... mujhe peeche se nanga dekhna chahti hai yeh.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Papa ye hospital hai yahan sab yehi pehnte hain..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: --Ye nurse mujh pe kal se line maar rahi hai...

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Papa please, what nonsense..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Nonsense! Main so gaya aur isne kuch andar ghusa diya toh?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arrey koi kuch nahin ghusayega..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: --Main bhi 21 saal army mein tha.. Ye sab tareek maloom hain mujh ko.. Pagal na samajh, meri pant la..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Papa, discharge hoge toh pant mil jayegi. The door opens, the two brothers enter the room, the gran dad notices them.  15.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu-- Suddenly the grand dad pretends to be a cop, he points hi fingers at Rahul and takes a fake gun shot. Arjun behaves like he’s stopping the bullet from hitting Rahul and falls down. Rahul’s reaction is delayed. The NURSE is a bit zapped and the parents a bit embarrass

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (shouts) Tu hamesha late girta hai!!!

dialogues.speaker: HOSPITAL ROOM
dialogues.text: Rahul decides to play along and pretends to die too. A pa by looks in. Grandad re-shoots at the nurse who continues look least amused.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Mar moti mar! (to Arjun) Lagta hai iss bhains ne bullet proof jacket pehna hai, commander grenade phenko.. Arjun starts to giggle. The passer by still staring in, t father gets embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arjun bas bahut ho gaya. Bachpana chhodo aur upar se report le kar aao. (to Grand dad) Aur papa please aap thoda control karo. Nurse ko sorry bolo.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Grenade phenkne ke liye sorry.

dialogues.speaker: NURSE
dialogues.text: (to mum) Iske baad, inhen psychiatrist ward mein dikha dijiye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun’s waiting for some reports when he notices someone.  16.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (calls out) Wasim! ! WASIM, a man in his late 20’s, comes forward, they hug.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Long time. Kab aaya tu, phone to karta! Yahaan kya kar raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dadu got a heart attack.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Dadu zinda hain?-- matlab..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dude!

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: --Sorry, Sorry.. Theek ho gaye hai na?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Better hain! Tu kya kar raha hai yahan?

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Mat pooch bro. (little embarrassed) Piles.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Are you serious! Bro, ab Shinchows ka Chilli chicken kaise khaenge? They both burst out laughing.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Saale you toh aren’t allowed to take my ass! Mujhe photography course mein akela chhodhke khud toh US bhaag gaya. Pata hai puppa ke photo studio mein kitna bore ho raha hoon? Smile karo, photo kheecho, copy becho...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (laughs) I miss you man!

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: We should catch up bro. Aaj raat milein? Malik ka bungla yaad hai? Jahan hum chup chup ke.. (smoking action) Yaad hai  17.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Haan haan? Wahaan koi rehta hai? (notices someone) Dude woh tera bhai Boobly hai na? A MUSCULAR GUY; the body building kind, in his early 20's weight lifting a kid in a wheel chair.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Bro, mat pooch. Ek saal se Mr. Ooty contest ki taiyaari kar raha hai. Jahaan jata hai, shuru ho jata hai.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ussey samjha itna pressure na de. Tujhe already piles hai, ussey hernia na ho jaye...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Din mein do baar, bas aise, ungli yahaan aur ye sui aapka sugar level check kar legi... Rahul puts Grand dad’s finger on a compact blood sugar machine. The needle pricks Grand dad’s finger.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Ouch!! Ye kya gobar gift hai? Kuch dhang ka lata...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Achcha toh kya chahiye aapko? (grand dad does smoking weed action) Dadu kya aap bhi!?

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Arjun, tu kya laya hai mere liye? Arjun’s handing the reports to his father and is caught a off guard. He checks his pockets and pulls out a half eat pack of M & M's.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gems..C’mon. Grand dad opens his mouth, Arjun’s about to fling one..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: --Arjun!!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (stops) Blood mein sugar badhega nahin, toh tera gift kaise use karienge.  29 30 18.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul and father are walking into the living room.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Tu retreat ke liye yahan pe bhi kuch properties kyoun nahin dekh leta?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Haan why not?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Main baat karta hun broker se..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother stands next to the bathroom supervising the plumbe an old SONG PLAYS OFF his mobile, while fixing the leakin pipe. She exits,

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Udhar se tight.. aur neeche se thoda m-seal lagana.. Aur Phone band karo.. Father enters.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (sarcastically to plumber) Is kaam ke paise le raha hai bhai.. Use bhi toh kuch karne do.. (she leaves) Seekh le kuch, sab kuch aata hai inhe - accounts, cooking, plumbing.

dialogues.speaker: PLUMBER
dialogues.text: (smiles sheepishly) Cycle se doosra paana le ke aaya sir.. (geishu enters) Bhaiya kuttey se darr lagta hai, isko baand do zara na..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Maa, Rahul ko baand do zara please.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Haha! So funny.. youtube pe daal de.. Ek-do hit mil hi jaayenge.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arjun geishu ko bahar le ja. Father’s phone RINGS.  31 32 19.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (checks the phone) Doctor ka phone hai, Arjun idhar aake sambhal zara..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (avoiding him) Geishu ko bahar le jana hai...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (re: Arjun) Useless! Main karta hun papa, aap baat karo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun’s walking Geishu on a leash. The dog takes a long l

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Saale Coonoor mein baadh laane ka iraada hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father has just finished explaining to the family about h conversation with the Doctor.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Fine.. Agar Doctor bol rahe hain ke dadu ko Bangalore mein dikhana hai toh dikha dete hain..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Beta, utna simple nahin hai na. Already stents pe dhaayi laakh lag gaye hain, uske oopar Bangalore mein bypass.. admission, surgery, recovery, banglore mein rehna padega, medicines.. bahut kharcha hoga..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kitna lagega?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tumhara advance aana tha na pichle mahine? Kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Payment phasi hui hai. (mother shakes her head) Main Sashi se poochta hoon--  20.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Baat baar par apne chote bhai se paise mang lete ho.. Kuch toh sharam karo..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Kis baat ki sharam.. hum dono hi unke bete hain na..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Magar kharcha toh sirf wahee uthata hai.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Papa rehte kiske saath hain.. Humare saath na.. Aur jab woh bahar padne gaya tha toh kharcha kisne uthaya tha.. maine!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Bees saal pehle uske college ka kharcha kya uthaya liya toh ab zindagi bhar usse vasool karte rahoge?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Mera bhai hai.. Mujhe jo karna--

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa, Please. Papa kharcha kitna hoga?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Is baar Shashi se paise lene ki koi zaroorat nahin hai.. Catering ke kaam ke liye jo paise FD mein bachaye thhe.. Woh FD todh do.. At the mention of the FD, Father avoids eye contact.

dialogues.speaker: PLUMBER
dialogues.text: Sir, thoda madat kareinge.. Father uses this opportunity to leave the discussion and goes to the BATHROOOM:

dialogues.speaker: PLUMBER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Zara ye pakdenge. Tight sir.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa, aap tension mat lo.. Main aur Sashi chacha sambhal lenge.. apni investment agle saal kar lunga...  21.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kyun? Itne saalon se iss retreat ke baare mein baat kar rahe ho. You invest! Koi toh sensible aadmi ho ghar mein.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Rahul ek bada kapda le ke aa zara.. He leaves

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (walks to the bathroom) FD todne mein kya dikkat hai?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Chal, jaldi kar.. (sheepishly to the mother) Haan mein dekhta hun.. Pehle ye kaam nipta lun, ya tumse lad lun.. Mum realizes something’s wrong..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Idhar dekho zara.. (the penny drops) Ohhhh.. Agar tumne phir se.. Harsh idhar dekho..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (to plumber) Kitni der lagegi yaar tere ko..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Harsh!! FD ke papers do mujhe.. Aur ye mat bolna ki tumne phir se..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Loan ka installment kahan se deta? Tumhare khayali catering business se? Ghar se nikal dete agar installment nahin bharta toh..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Pathetic! Woh mere paise thhe.. Teen saal se main bacha rahi thhi.. Rahul comes back in with a cloth.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: .--Bacha toh unhi paison se rahi thi na jo main tumhein ghar chalane ke liye deta thha... Tumhare paise kahan se huye??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad!! Okay stop! 22. Father lets go off the pipe in anger, the water squirts..

dialogues.speaker: PLUMBER
dialogues.text: Sir, zara sambhal ke.. Plumber gets caught between the crossfire..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kahaan kharche tumne woh paise? Tumhara business toh thap pada hai.. Anu ko kitne diye usmein se??

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Dimag kharab ho gaya hai! (to Rahul) --Ghar baithke bas yaheen ulti- seedhi manghadant kahaniyaan banati rehti hai.. yeh pakad.. Rahul and Father swap position.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Manghadant? Pichli baar jab tumhari payment aayi thi.. Smriti ne bataya mujhe.. Anu ke paas WagonR aa gayi.. Kahaan se aaye uske paas itne paise? Aasman se tapke?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Tapke honge, mujhe kya pata? Main accountant hoon kya uska? Ab bas ye bakwass band karo please!! (to the plumber) Chal, ho gaya tu nikal.. Arjun enters. He unleashes Geishu and walks up to Rahul.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kahin nahin jaa raha tu..Dhang se theek kar..aur kaha na phone band kar..Ek boond nahin tapakni chaiye..

dialogues.speaker: PLUMBER
dialogues.text: Haan madam.. Bilkul theek ho jayega.. Rahul intervenes..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dad.. Maa.. CALM DOWN!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Aaj sab mere bina hi shuru ho gaye?  23.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Tu apne kamre mein jaa yaar. Aap dono please shaant ho jao. Mere paas paise hain, artists retreat phir kabhi ho jayega. Chachu aur main sambhal lenge..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kisko paise chahiye?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yaar, can you please just shut up and go?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Main maa se pooch rahah hun na.. Tu chup beth--

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tumhare papa ne mere paise uda diye aur ab chachu se bheek mangaenge!

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita bas!! Bahut ho gaya !

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kitney paise chahiyen??

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arjun.. Tu rehne de na.. Karodon kama raha hai, jo tu dega?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tera matlab kya hai saale!! Tere paison pe jee raha hoon kya?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (avoiding FATHER) Tum se zyaada toh Timmy hi madat kar degi.. Yahan se toh wahi better thi main..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: --Timmy ko madat karni hi hai toh phir se jaake do mahine wahin reh lo. Father’s phone RINGS. No one pays attention.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (overlapping) Haan toh, Tumhare saath kaun si acchi zindagi ji rahi hun..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (overlapping) Aap do mahine maasi ke paas rahe the?  24.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Papa aap itna cheekh kyun rahe ho.. Do minute ruk ke ye toh bata do ki problem kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Tu apni zindagi sambhal le... phir humari problems sambhal lena.. Badi meherbaani hogi..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Aap har baat pe taane kyun maarte ho?

dialogues.speaker: PLUMBER
dialogues.text: Ho gaya sir.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Kitna hua?

dialogues.speaker: PLUMBER
dialogues.text: Ab is bure wagt mein jitna theek lage--

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Ek thappad padega na.. Apna phone band kar.. The phone still RINGING. Plumber check his phone.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Phone aapka baj raha hai.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (furiously at plumber) Behra nahin hoon! (to Arjun) Sab ne mujhe gadha samajha ke rakha hail!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (angrily as Rahul starts pulling him back) Maine aapko gadha kab bola! Gadha toh main hoon! Jab se aaya hoon koi kuch batata hi nahin! Padosi ka beta hoon kya? I’m tired of this shit... Seriously!! Don’t touch me.. Stay away..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Beta just calm down-

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: --Ghar ki koi baat hoti hai, mujhe aakhri mein pata chalta hai.. Dadu hospital gaye toh pehle Rahul ko phone karo.. Bullshit yaar!!  25.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (yelling) Kyunki tu humesha bachchon ki tarah react karta hai!! Now Stop screaming! !

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (condescendingly to Arjun) Arjun paise hain koi M&M nahin jo jeb se nikaal ke de di.. Tu jaa, geishu ko bahar ghuma.. In rage, Arjun throws a glass from the nearby table at hi Rahul ducks and just gets saved.. And then charges toward Rahul..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Saale bada hero ban raha hai tu? Ek kitaab kya publish ho gayi. Mom and Dad try to separate them.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Ruko.. Band karo ye sab!!

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arjun behave yourself. Calm down you both.. As Arjun is getting pulled back by Mom, he screams.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Itni akad mat dikha. Main aur tu donon jaante hain ki teri asliyat kya hai!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (stopping him) Arjun enough is enough! Arjun storms off. Phone still RINGING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mum follows him outside the house.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arjun! !--

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Bas maa.. aap bhi jaante ho ye chor hail!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: --5 saal baad saath-saath aaye ho.. janvaron ki tarah ladna zaroori hai?  34 35 26.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Haan aapko toh main hi galat lagta hoon.. Rahul ne kabhi kuch kiya hi nahin.. Sab kuch ek coincidence tha.. Bas! Mum’s afraid that an issue that was buried years ago is starting to sprout again. Arjun leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun tries to call Wasim while driving. Nobody answers.

dialogues.speaker: I/E. BUNGALOW
dialogues.text: Arjun weaves his way through a semi-crowded house party. doesn’t recognize any of these faces from before but he continues to walk regardless. We see a guy and a girl sitting opposite one another, abo to ARM-WRESTLE each other. The guy SAHIL is skinny and ti the girl BUNKOO, well-built. Next to them is a girl standing on a chair cheering them Arjun can’t seem to get a look at her.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Come one guys, koi toh Saahil pe bharosa karo... The crowd is going bananas cheering for Bunkoo and money streaming in for her.

dialogues.speaker: SAHIL
dialogues.text: Tujhe demolish karne mein bahut mazaa aayega!

dialogues.speaker: BUNKOO
dialogues.text: Ya right!! Curious, Arjun walks around to get a better look... but j when he’s about to see her face the LIGHTS GO OFF. NO MUS A bit of COMMOTION in the dark and then a few people swit on their PHONE LIGHTS. He finally sees her face dimly lit the phone light, this is TIA, mid 20's, extremely cute, b totally not aware of it.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (shouts loudly) Kishore!! Fuse ko theek karo pleasssee!! Phir se udh gaya!

dialogues.speaker: KISHORE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ji baby ek second.  36 27. Crowd continues heckling ... “We love you Kishore!” ...

dialogues.speaker: SAHIL
dialogues.text: (whispers) Apne hone waali pati ki kuch toh izzat kar le.

dialogues.speaker: BUNKOO
dialogues.text: Tu toh mujhe demolish karne waala thha na?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Don’t worry Sahil, main tumpe paise lagane ke liye ready hoon. She pulls out a fifty rupee note and places it next to hi and the crowd laughs.

dialogues.speaker: SAHIL
dialogues.text: Thanks T! Tumhare 50 rupayon se mujhe kaafi motivation mil raha hai.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Aur yeh... (looks at Arjun) Dude, sukda dikhta hai.. but he’s got core strength!

dialogues.speaker: SAHIL
dialogues.text: Yeahhhh! I doooo! Arjun; not to seem like a gate-crasher, pulls out some ca and hands it to her. The LIGHTS come back on... So does t MUSIC and the cheering continues... as the crowd goes “Three... Two... One...” Bunkoo simply slams Sahil’s hand one swift motion. Arjun leaves.

dialogues.speaker: I/E. BATHROOM
dialogues.text: Arjun sits inside the bathroom alone, sipping on a beer a holding a cigarette. He’s in no mood to be in the middle party. He’s latched the door but somehow its still open. walks in, holding her head obviously not aware Arjun’s inside.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Ahhh! My head. (notices him) Hey!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Sorry, main nikalta hun..  28.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Sorry maine tumhare paise duba diye-

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: It’s okay.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: --Mujhe laga Sahil seriously had core strength! (looks at herself in the mirror) Do I look Drunk? Arjun shakes his head. She splashes a little water on her face and then cleans it with a washcloth, then looks for something in the cabinet. SCREAMING AND SHOUTING from outside.

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wow.. Ye party bahaar ki party se bahut better hai.. (sits on the pot) Aur comfortable bhi. He looks at her. A girl could have never looked prettier sitting on a toilet seat! It feels a little quieter than should, she breaks it. She makes

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tum Sahil ke dost ho?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nahin, Wasim ka.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Wasim?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ahh.. woh, yahaan ke owner ko jaanta hai...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Main yahaan ki owner hoon aur main wasim ko nahin janti.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Oh. Look I’m sorry, I swear mujhe Wasim ne bulaya thha.. a serious face. ARJUN (CONT’D) Aur mujhe woh mil nahi raha tha-- And -- I was just-- having a terrible day.. toh main,

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Security!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Main jaata hun-- He starts to walk away. They both break into a laughter. She extends her hand to shake his.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: I'm kidding.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Shit! You scared me.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tia.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Arjun.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tum itne pareshaan kyoun ho??

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nahin.. Kuch nahin...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Girlfriend se ladai hui hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ahhh..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Toh phir?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: --Bhai se...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Bai se?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: “Bhai” se... (chuckles) Main bai se jhagda kyun karunga?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: That’s a pretty good point!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Toh tum yahaan? I mean, yeh ghar saalon se khaali thha.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Peeche waali tea estate aur ye ghar dadu ka hai par jab main 5 saal ki thi toh Dad business ke liye bombay shift ho gaye so.. 29.  39 37 30.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Toh ab phir se rehne ka iraada hai?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Nahin, actually lease pe dene ka iraada hai. But, kyunki meri best friend ka fiance Ooty se hai, I thought ek last party toh banti hai. BANG! Wasim opens the door & rushes in as if he wants to throw up. Tia quickly gets off the pot allows him to use

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ewww..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dude you okay? Wasim waits for a couple of beats..

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Ya, false alarm. (to Arjun) Tu yahaan kya kar raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tia, Wasim. Wasim, Tia.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Tum dono bathroom mein kyun ho?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Ek saath shower lene waale thhe.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: BUNKOO, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Tia, i-pod de yaar! Let’s get this party started.. MUSIC CUE: PBS - 1, as an i-Pod is connected to the speak

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The party has winnowed down. A few friends sit in a circl playing spin the bottle. After a couple of rounds, the bo stops between Arjun and Tia. A long beat. They look at ea other. She’s a sport and Arjun can’t help but feel lucky. kiss is imminent. Arjun leans forward and so does she.. Everyone CHEERS for them... When suddenly ...  38 39 40 4l 31.

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK GIRL
dialogues.text: Arjun kaun hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Main!

dialogues.speaker: DRUNK GIRL
dialogues.text: Tumhein koi bathroom mein bula raha hai. INT. BATHROOM —- MOMENTS LATER Arjun, Tia, Bunkoo and Sahil find Wasim drunk lying on th floor..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun is driving Wasim back who’s hammered and nauseous. Wasim leans out of the window and throws up a little more

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Wait.. Ulti nahin, yahin chhodh dunga saale! Wasim shows him the middle finger. Far-far away we see a of a sunrise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul, still a bit upset about last night’s fight, mechanically plays “fetch” with the dog. After a moment, goes inside the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks into the kitchen, where the father’s making breakfast. The awkwardness from last night lingers on.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Property agent saade gyaarah baje aa raha hai, tumhein kuch properties dikha dega, uske baad dadu ko jaake bol do hum unhe Bangalore le jayenge. Sashi ka ab tak phone nahin lag raha hai par hum manage kar lenge.. Father hands him a cup of tea.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dad Mom do mahine ke liye maasi ke saath kyun reh rahi thhi?  43a 42 32.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Waapas aa gayi hai na?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Woh baat nahin hai dad.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin bas woh mujhe bura dikhana chahti hai. (beat) Jab se divorce ke baad Timmy maasi ne catering business kya shuru kar diya, ise lagta hai ye bhi kar legi.. And how can she compare me with...that bloody wife-beater? Kya main tumhare mausa ki tarah sharaabi hoon? Gaali galoch karta hoon?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Come on dad. Mom thoda support chahti hain, that’s all.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Aur itne saal jab mujhe support chahiye thha? (beat) Jab tak bank ki naukri thhi sab theek tha... phir khud ka business karne ki koshish ki, tumhare liye, uske liye.. Ab financially thoda stress chal raha hai toh kya karun? Jaan le loon apni?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dad please...

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Thak gaya hoon yaar. Father gets up to leave. Rahul gives him a side hug..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dad, you are great.. I promise, sab theek ho jayega... one day ata time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul uncomfortably rides pillion on BROKER MAKHIJA's scooter. It comes to a halt outside the hospital. Rahul g off.

dialogues.speaker: MAKHIJA
dialogues.text: Sir, main kal nayi list banata hun.  33.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yes please, Bhoot bangla nahin ek creative logon ke kaam liye ek shaant jagah dhoondh raha hun please.. (back into the phone) Ya nick, no, I’m gonna look for some more places.. I’1l send you the pictures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul walks into the hospital room, he sees Arjun doing a wheelie with Grand dad on his wheelchair. Grand dad giggl like a 5 year old. Rahul stares at Arjun and Dadu in shoc

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kya? Dadu bore ho rahe thhe.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Toh kal skydiving kara lena? (beat; shakes his head) Nurse Blood reports manga rahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: La raha hoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul helps Grand dad get comfortable on his bed. Dharmen (their servant) is making him orange juice on the side ta

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Tu hamesha aisa kyun behave karta hai..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aise kaise?

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Jaise kisi ne tere pichwade mein danda ghusa diya ho... (beat) Bachpan mein mummy papa ne pant utarke bum pe laat di hoti na... toh aaj tu itna bada saddu nahin hota.. Grand dad FARTS. Rahul looks a bit embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ab paadoon kaise yeh bhi bateyaga?  34.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu!! Main yeh batane aaya thha ki hum aapko treatment ke liye Bangalore le ja rahe hain.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Main nahin ja raha koi bangalore vangalore... Aise bol raha hai jaise London Paris ghumane le ja raha hai.. Parsoe nabbey saal ka hone waala hoon, aur main apna janamdin sabke saath ghar mein bitaana chahta hoon... samjha!!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu magar aapke--

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Abbe chup! Hindi film ke villain ki tarah nahin marna mujhe... kuch bhi karo saale marte hi nahin... (acting like a villain) Agar main mara toh ... aaah tumhare baap ka asli naam aah tumhe kabhi aah... aahh.. aaah... (nurse pops in to check) Ab jana hi hai toh bas (snaps his fingers) yun jaunga. Dadu drops dead. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu?

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (gets up) Waise bhi tum sab ko zyaada din nahin jhel paunga. (beat) Agar sachmuch mera khayal hai na ...-toh ek kaam kar lo - yeh jo aakhri kuch din, hafte, mahine... jo bhi bache hain... mujhe khushi khushi jeeney do aur tum sab bhi khush raho.. (beat) Marne se pehle mujhe bas ek happy family photo chahiye, sab ke saath! (beat; gets idea) Photo ka title rakhenge umm - (beat; he thinks) Kapoor & Sons - Since 1921.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (smiles) Aap toh writer nikle dadu...  45 46 47 35.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Tere writer waale genes tere duffer baap se nahin aaye. Rahul chuckles. The nurse comes in with an injection.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (conspicuous ) Aur sun, iss moti ko hatake ek pataaka nurse dila de. (Nurse injects him) Ouuccchh.. Kamini kitna zor se ghusaegi! Aaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul and Arjun are driving back. The car comes and stops the toll, the same LANKY MAN sits there. Rahul can’t find change, so Arjun pays the Lanky guy with all the lollipop

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Yeh le, tere 23 rupay. Rahul and Arjun chuckle and it eases the tension between them. As they drive a little ahead.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (with reserve but trying) Kal raat ke liye sorry. (no reply from Arjun) Aur abhi hospital ke liye bhi. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - LATE EVE Rahul looks at a framed PHOTOGRAPH of him, Arjun, Mum and taken several years ago at an amusement park. It's startl how happy they look.. He wonders, if he can do something make everyone happy again.

dialogues.speaker: I/E. HOUSE
dialogues.text: LATE NIGHT. Rahul’s walking the dog slightly away from th house, he lights a cigarette.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Makhija ji.. kal kitney baje? Kuch Dhang ka mila? Ok. As Rahul cuts the call.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Rahul.. Mom andar bula rahin hain..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (surprised; drops the ciggy) Hey.. okay..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Aur sun..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Haan..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Do benson lights bhi mangwaayen hain...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Very funny.. Rahul starts to look for his cigarettes. Arjun offers it to him. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Here..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (takes it) Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Doctor ne kya bola?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kya fark padta hai. Yeh pooch ki dadu ne kya bola. (beat ) Tabiyat thodi theek hui bas birthday pe ghar aana hai unhe..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: --90th birthday dude.. Kuch karte hain na..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Main bhi wohi soch raha tha.. Dadu ke liye ek surprise birthday party organize karte hain...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: You mean.. Coonoor ki khoobsoorat bhuddiyon ke saath?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Nahin, Russian strippers aur caviar ke saath. 36. lights one and  37.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Caviar ka paata nahin but russian strippers se jo dadu ko khushi milegi!! They laugh, enjoying each other’s company after years.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yaad hai ek baar jab mom ko dadu ki porn magazines mili thi..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Haan Comode ke peeche..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: He’s crazy!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dude unmein se ek magazine meri bhi thi.. Barely Legal.. (they laugh) Aur mom ne jab magazines dhoondi toh main soch raha tha ki mera kya hoga..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Barely legal.. Batata hun mom ko abhi saale..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dude!

dialogues.text: Mumma ko bhejoon kya?

dialogues.text: Chance hi nahin... As Rahul continues to snatch the phone, dialogue fades ou 48 INT/EXT. TIA’S BUNGALOW - DAY

dialogues.speaker: BUNKOO

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Itney dinon baad aayi hoon. Thodey din yaheen rehna chahti hoon. Plus woh client mujhe paagal kar raha hai.. Teen proposals reject kar chuka hai.. Woh sab bhi khatam karna hai..

dialogues.speaker: BUNKOO
dialogues.text: Fine. Par tere birthday ke liye main waapas aa rahi hoon.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Dude, are you mad? Paanch ghante ki drive kar ke wapis aaoge.. Apna pre- honeymoon enjoy karo yaar... I’m good, I’m great..

dialogues.speaker: AT THE GATE
dialogues.text: Tia and Rahul are in the middle of a conversation.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: It’s a really nice place Tia. Main apne partner se pictures share karta hun and I’1l get back to you. Tumhari family se koi hai jissey hum baat shuru kar sakte hain. I mean koi jo business handle karta hai..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Ummmm... Me!!  49 39.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Oh sorry! Mujhe laga yahaan ka owner koi mota sa, 60 saal ka buddha.. baal kam.. you know, waisa koi hoga..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Don’t worry jab main dentures aur wig bina ghoomti hoon.. Bilkul waise hi lagti hoon!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: You are funny!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: You are a hot. (awkward beat) I’m funny.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (smiles at Tia) I’1l see you soon. Tia walks back in to see Bunkoo & Sahil all ready to leav

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aur yeh Hawaaii main.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Bachpan se sapna thha ki Hawaii ke nude beaches par nanga ghumoon... Rahul laughs out aloud.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Haan birthday pe wahin le jaate hain.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (eyes widen) I’m ready. Bas... chhaati shave karni hai.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Time miley toh six pack bhi bana lena.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (sips orange juice) Ward boy keh raha thha iss ipapad ke saath kuch bhi kar sakte hain!  40.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: I-pad dadu.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Pad paapad, kya phark padta hai. (beat) Film dekh sakte hain? Rahul nods. He waits for the mother to go into the bathro

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (a bit hesitant) Blue film? Rahul nods hesitantly again.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Saale tum logon ki generation... Pata hai jawaani mein kitne paapad bele hain maine? (beat) Teen mahiney wait karne ke baad, sirf do dino ke liye Ram Teri Ganga Maili Alankar mein lagi. Ticket nahin mili, toh teri dadi ko jhoot bolke bangalore bhaag gaya - bas uss ek scene ke liye. Mandakini geeli sari mein waterfall se nikalti hai. Aur mein uske peeche khada thha. Usi waterfall mein. He realizes the mother has been watching them.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaj kele bade bekaar hain. Rahul bursts out laughing. Mother leaves the room.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Saale issey kehte hain topic change... Rahul taps some letters on the i-pad and shows it to his grand dad and we hear lyrics “Tujhe bulayein!!”

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (plays the song ...) Dadu ... ON YOUTUBE: Mandikini is coming out of the water.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: O Teri! Kya baat kar raha hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul’s on the phone.  41.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arjun, ek idea hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grand dad is busy on the I-pad in the BG.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (asks the WARD-BOY) Arrey, issey rewind kaise karte hain?? Sikha mujhe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun’s at Wasim’s Photo Studio. It’s moderately busy, Wasim’s talking to his brother over the phone and simultaneously giving his employee some framing instructi

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Haan, haan do minute mein nikal raha hoon.. tu ready reh, main pick up karne bas abhi aaya - (cuts the call / To Arjun) Tu kitna late lateef hai yaar? Boobly jaan le lega meri.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Arrey dadu ke liye hai yaar. Aur waise bhi Mr. Ooty contest hai, unhe toh khush hona chahiye ki koi toh participate kar raha hai.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Boobly meri tarah gifted nahi hai yaar! Uske paas na akal hai na shakal! Body building uska sab kuch hai. (assistant calls him) Ek sec, I think tera kaam ho gaya. He goes into the printing room. Arjun sees Tia standing n to a pan bidi shop. He walks up to her.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tiaa!!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: SHOPKEEPER
dialogues.text: Nahin hai madame’  54 55 42.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Toh kahan milegi ab? Pehle toh idhar se hi--

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kya dhundh rahi ho?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Ahh.. arrey woh meethi waali cigarettes! Remember jab hum chothe the toh.. I used to love them.. (beat) Anyway, tum kya kar rahe ho? INT. PRINTER’S SHOP - DAY Wasim walks out with a huge Mandakini cut-out while he ta to his brother on the cellphone. After looking at the cut out, Tia gives a slow clap.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Don’t judge me... dadu ka birthday gift hai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu ke doston mein se do toh already...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Amen?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Nabeel kaka ko landline pe phone karna, woh cell nahin uthate. Rahul dials the number.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aap bhi apne kuch friends bula lo.. Aur haan, chachu se finally baath hui.. keh rahe hain ki jald se jald nikal rahe hain parson raat tak pahunch jaayeinge.

dialogues.text: Suno, chachu ko.. kuch bolna mat?

dialogues.text: (holding phone) Kis baare mein?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tumhare papa ki wajah se us din jhagda jo hua tha..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (Someone answers the phone. ) Hello. Ji Chowdhary Kaka hain? Main Rameshchand ji ke yahaan se. (a beat) Oh. Sorry to hear that. Arjun and Rahul share a look...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Iss rate pe party sirf main, tu aur Wasim attend karenge.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Papa ko bol unke friends ko bhi invite kar lein. Rahul follows his mother into the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They return back to their conversation. She feeds him a m

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom aap ko Timmy Maasi ka business join karna toh karo I’1l support you magar aap baat baat pe papa pe kyoun chad jaate ho?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (points to a juicer mixer) Yeh dekh? 30th anniversary gift - Juicer mixer.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Shaayad umar ke saath practical ho gaye hain...

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Practicality ki baat nahin hai, woh mujhe appreciate hi nahin karte. Bas Anu ki tareef karte rehte hain.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (turning her towards him) Yeh Anu Anu kyun kar rahe ho aap? Har cheez ko itna over-analyze mat karo. Hum sab adults hain.. baithke aaram se baat kar sakte hain.. BLAST.. In the background, Arjun and Wasim have stuffed balloon under their shirts to make them look like boobs a Wasim is pricking them with needles.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: OK, I take it back.. Hum “sab” adults nahin hain.. They share a smile...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aap kuch dinon ke liye mere saath London mein reh lo.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tu toh itna busy rehta hai...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: 8 saal ho gaye hain, saath nahin rahoge, toh pataa kaise chalega ki main kya karta hoon, kaise rehta hoon, more importantly kiske saath rehta hun.. You’1ll get to know me better.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Oh please, teri maa hoon. Mujhse achcha koi nahi jaanta tujhe. (beat) Meri itni chinta hai toh yeh Nicky/ Samantha/ Freida ka chhod, ek achchi si Indian ladki se shaadi kar le. Aur make me a dadi..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom pleaaseee..  45.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Maa.. aapka sapna sach ho gaya.. Wasim walks in, with a balloon under his stomach looking a pregnant woman..

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Main Rahul ke perfect bacchon ki maa banne ke liye taiyaar hoon.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (laughing) Dono ko marunga main!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tum nahin samjoge Rahul, kuch kuch hota hai. They all burst into laughter. Phone beeps.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (checks his watch) Okay, I gotta go.. 57 I/E. TIA’'S BUNGALOW - VARIOUS PARTS - EVENING Rahul is face timing with Nick and showing him various pa of the house and discussing different ideas (ad lib).

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 63 Rahul and Tia walk through the house:

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: I can’t believe yeh jagah itne saalon se band thhi. Agar main tumhari jagah hota toh 2 mahine mein ek baar toh zaroor aata.. Bombay se 2 ghante ki toh flight hai..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Wahi toh problem hai.. Mujhe flights mein bethne se dar lagta hai.. I have a flying phobia..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Oh.. Really.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Waise sabhi logon ko kisi na kisi se toh dar lagta hi hai. Kisi ko unchaiyon se darr lagta hai, to kisi ko andhere se.  46.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tumhein kis se lagta hai?

dialogues.text: Uhh. actually.. Chuhon se...

dialogues.speaker: TIA

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: --Sorry Kishore mujhe Nepali samajh mein nahi aati. Rahul bursts out laughing.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: woh tumhein invite nahin kar raha?

dialogues.speaker: TIA

dialogues.text: Main bahar kha lungi.. (to Rahul) Yahaan koi accha restaurant hai?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Shinchows? (Tia shakes her head) Jagah purani hai, par food is awesome. The chilly chicken is to die for!! I love it..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: You want to come along.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (thinks-checks his watch) Uhh.. Ya sure..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are both walking out of the house.  60 61 62 47.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Oh Tumhari gaadi kahan hai?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Nahin, main toh Makhija ke saath...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Shit, yahaan se auto bhi nahin milega. At this moment she notices something..

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kishore!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Kishore rides the OLD MOPED, Rahul is sandwiched betwe Tia and him. This makes for an awkward but hilarious mome

dialogues.text: (to Rahul) Ghar ke saath yeh moped aur Kishore donon free milenge.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Wow.. what a deal!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk up a narrow stairway. She’s a bit unsure of thi

dialogues.speaker: INT. SMALL RESTAURANT- NIGHT
dialogues.text: A small restaurant but crowded. A north eastern BAND SING “Gazab Ka Hai Din” from QSQT. They sit on a small table, already mid-meal.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (eyes watering) Aaaaa! Ssoooo spicyyyy! I love it.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (passes her a beer) Yeh lo... She takes a big sip. Rahul notices food stuck between her teeth.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ummm.. Woh yahan kuch.. He points out to something stuck in her tooth. She’s supe embarrassed but tries to be all breezy.  48.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Oh thanks! (stares at Rahul) Uh, tumhare naak se kuch...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (embarrassed, scrambling for a napkin) Oh, sorry...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Just messing with you.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tumhare liye zyaada yucky kya hoga? Daant mein atka hua chicken, ya naak se latka hua booger?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Booger ! Definitely booger ! They chuckle. They eat a whole lot of momos and drink bee small momo keeps slipping out of her chopstick, he takes in his hand and eats it, making her comfortable. She pick up one too. There’s something about Rahul that she likes.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AN HOUR LATER: They are both a few drinks down.. Having a good time.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Agar maine yeh kiya toh phir tumhe dance floor pe aana hi padega!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Pagalpan ki bhi limit hoti hai!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: That's rubbish ! Pagalpan ki koi limit nahin hoti! She laughs...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Tia cutely walks up to a bald sweaty man sitting on the neighboring table. She leans over and in one swift motion dabs his bald sweaty head with a tissue and kisses him on head! He turns around zapped. She starts lightly whacking head with her hand.

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to bald man) Shit, Machar tha.. Machar!! Sorry!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As soon as he turns around, she cringes and wipes her mou walks back to her table, Rahul can’t stop laughing..

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Eeksss, sweaty yuuuuckk uurrgghhh. (to Rahul) Get your ass on the Dance floor Rahul!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: They are on a small (for lack of a better word) dance flo their own silly rendition of some dance moves. Rahul’s go few cool moves up his sleeve. It’s the first time we’ve s him let loose and we realize this guy knows how to have f

dialogues.text: Come on Tia, show me your moves!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Kaunse moves?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arrey har kisi ka ek trademark step hota hai. Jaise mera? Jab party shuru hoti hai toh main milk shake banata hoon... He dances, showing her a milk shake step..

dialogues.text: Phir jaise mood banta hai main istri maarne lagta hoon, aise ... (we see the istri move) Aur jab music perfect ho toh main gaadi bhi dhone lagta hoon! He does the ‘car washer’ dance step. She does a step..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Normally main aise nachti hoon. She swings her hair about from side to side.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Oooh... Yeh shampoo ad wala step hai...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Lekin jab main bahut high ho jaati hoon toh main She does the “chakki peesing” step..

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sexy chakki peesne waali ban jaati hoon..  63 64 65 50. He laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yahaan kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (recalls) God!! Phir se fuse udh gaya.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only source of light is the PHONE TORCH. They go to t fuse box, it’s too messy. All of a sudden she screams!!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Aaaaaahhh!! Choohaaaa! Rahul’s shit scared, he screams like a girl, runs a few p and falls.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: shit shit shit !!!! She bursts out laughing, almost falling on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You’re mean Tia ! She laughs. EXT. TIA’S BUNGALOW - FUSE BOX - MOMENTS LATER They are both giggling at the fuse box. It’s at an odd height.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Pata nahin woh chaar foot ka Nepali upar kaise chadhta hai.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ghar pe seedhi hogi.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Pata nahin woh kya kahaan rakhta hai.  51.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ek kaam karo, main tumhe utha leta hoon na, tum fuse set karo. OK?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (a bit conscious) You're sure?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Oh please...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: No..seriously...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Shut up.. Main aaram se utha lunga. (gives her a little stick) Sharmao mat aur chadho. Come on! He holds her by the waist and pulls her up. She attempts fix it with a little stick. They both laugh as they try t it. Rahul’s phone rings but he doesn’t pay any attention.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Main thoda over confident ho gaya. Tum itni bhaari kaise ho? Tia bursts out laughing.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Shut up. Main bhaari nahin hoon. Mere bones bhaari hain. A wire sparks, she gets scared. They laugh a bit more.. H can’t hold her any longer. He brings her down. They are s laughing and it’s still dark. They are tipsy and she’s standing close to him. Suddenly, kisses him on the lip. Rahul wasn’t expecting this. After a beat, they hear some noise, he pulls back.

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kaun hai?

dialogues.speaker: KISHORE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Baby kidhar ho aap? They see a dim lantern being held up.. They both jump out the moment.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Haan idhar fuse ke paas. (little angry) Kab se bol rahi hun aapko ye theek karane ke liye.. Itni der se try kar rahein hain..  66 52. Kishore is curious about Rahul’s presence..

dialogues.speaker: KISHORE
dialogues.text: (smugly) Magar fuse toh idhar hai.. Woh toh pump room ka hai. He goes and fixes it. Awkward silence. She’s not sure how tackle this situation, her phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Listen, main chalta hoon. He checks his missed calls to avoid eye contact. There’s unresolved tension in the air.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Ahh.. Ya, sure.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Main apne partner se baat shuru karta hoon...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Yeah, sure. They share an awkward smile as he leaves. Tia answers pho

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bunkooo! (lets out a stupid scream) Ahhhh... I’m soo drunk... main kitni stupid hoon.. Oh God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boobly is lifting weights in the front seat while listeni to an OLD HINDI SONG. Arjun and Tia are on the backseat finding it really wierd.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Lataji ki awaaz mein kya pain hai.

dialogues.speaker: BOOBLY
dialogues.text: (pumping harder) No pain, no gain.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Aaj se main bhi gym mein KL sahab ke gaane sununga.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: By the way mera bhi birthday aa raha hai.. Aur mujhe birthday gift ke liye Boobly ka ek 10 by 2 cut out chahiye.. God he’s so sexy!!  67 68 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LOT OF CHEERING. It’s a mid-sized stadium but only half filled up. People sit on plastic chairs cheering as a few body builder type of men show off their bodies. Three jud who are in their 50’s sit with their score cards. Arjun a Wasim are loudly CHEERING too. Tia talks loudly to be hea over all the noise.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (loudly) This is maaaadddd!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: I can’t believe main yeh enjoy kar raha hoon...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Uss red undie waale ko dekho na... naak kitni lambi hai...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: You know what they say, lambi naak matlab--

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (re: Arjun’s nose) Tumhari naak toh kaafi choti hai!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (laughs) Dude!

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Bro, focus focus... Boobly stage pe aa raha hai! Boobly! Boobly! Boobly walks up front, showing off his biceps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun and Tia are walking back to Tia’s house.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (laughing) Arjun cheeee!!! That’s just gross!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Arrey socho, itne tight underwear mein koi bechara excited ho gaya toh,.. (he does the gesture with his finger and whistles) They laugh...  54.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Well, it’s only fair ki use extra muscles ke bonus points milne chahiyein.. Yeh wala pose mera favorite hai? She does a funny pose.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (teases her) Ek baar phir se.. Show.. She does it again to make him laugh, Arjun’s phone rings. ARJUN (CONT’D) One sec, mere bhai ka phone hai... (answers it) Yeah? Haan theek hai, main aur mom chale jayenge. Haan main thodi der mein aa raha hoon... Arjun cuts the call and Tia is smiling straight at him.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Toh Karan Arjun ka patch up ho gaya?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Haan.. Filal ke liye! But i’m sure kuch hi wagt mein woh kuch aisa karega ke I’1l wanna punch him in the face all over again She laughs. ARJUN (CONT’D) Tumhare koi bhai behen hain?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Nope.. One and only.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: How lucky! Mummy papa ne kitna papmer kiya hoga nahin? (imitates excited parents) Oh our little Barbie, pyaari gudiya, humari princess, you are the best!! (beat) Yeh sab mere saath kabhi nahin hua.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Achcha hi hai, agar woh tumhe “pyaari gudiya” bulate.. Thoda ajeeb hota na!  69 70 55.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: You know what I mean, mujhe kabhi koi attention nahin mili.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Chaudah saal ki thhi jab mere parents guzar gaye. So I guess, me too!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Oh I’m sorry... I’m really sorry.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: It’s okay. Tumhein thodi maloon tha. A beat and then to lighten the mood.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ek offer hai. Mujhe apna bungla de do aur tum meri family le lo. She chuckles. INT. TIA’S BUNGALOW KITCHEN - NIGHT A kettle of tea boiling spouting some steam, Tia picks it

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Sugar kitni? INT. TIA’'S BUNGALOW BEDROOM - NIGHT

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Two spoons please Arjun stands in Tia’s room - It’s spacious yet cozy. He notices a bunch of things lie around an open suitcase. A piece of lingerie hangs out partly from a suitcase. She w in with tea.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Listen I don’t mean to be inappropriate magar iske liye toh tumhein bahut padding lagegi. Ye kya hai? A 48 G ??? Tia’s face turns red and she lets out an embarrassed laug and yanks the bra from his hand.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Mera nahin hai.. You pervert! Bunkoo ka hai!  56.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Agar Bunkoo ko sahil ke baare mein kabhi thoda bhi doubt ho toh please contact me? Arjun’s phone beeps again..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arrey yaar.. Bhagawan ke liye koi mere bhai ko ek campose de do.. A beat or two as they settle in.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tum apne bhai se itna jhaagadte kyun ho?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: We have a pretty fucked up relationship.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: How come?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tum personal sawaal bahut poochti ho?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Dost aise hi bante hain.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: You don’t give up.. Do you?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (jokingly) Nope, I don’t! Tell me --- She smiles coyly. He can’t help but give in to her cutene

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Paanch saal pehle, maine apni pehli novel likhni shuru ki thi... aur mera bhai ki pehle novel flop ho chuki thi aur woh apni doosri novel pe atka hua tha.. (beat) Lekin ek saal baad, jab uski second novel publish hui toh it was a best- seller.. Problem sirf ye thi ki woh novel almost exactly mera story idea tha..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (whispery) Noooo..  57.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Of course writing style alag thha, ending alag thhi, but Characters, story line bahut similar.. Novel uski thhi par idea mera. (beat) And I know ki kayi baar do writers ek hi idea par kaam karte hain, it happens. Par do bhaiyon ko same time pe same idea it’s too much of a coincidence.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tumne ussey kabhi poocha nahin?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Poochta toh sab yaheen kehte ki humesha ki tarah main usske success se jal raha thha. Plus mom ko laga aisa issue humaari family ko todh dega...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Maybe she’s right...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Agar uss novel ke cover par mera naam hota toh publishers aaj mere peeche daud rahe hote, aur mere mom dad mujhe itna bada loser nahin samajhte

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tum loser nahin ho... Arjun gives a faint smile.

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tumhara mood theek karne ke liye kuch hai mere pass. Arjun wonders, if it’s the pending kiss.

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Here.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Thank you. He puts the bra on his heart. ARJUN (CONT’D) You know you’re right, kaafi better feel kar raha hoon. He folds the bra and puts it in his pocket.  71 72 73 58.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: By the way, tum kal kya kar rahi ho.. Mere dadu ka birthday hai.. Ek surprise party hai.. please come...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Ahh.. Sure, geriatric ward ka re- union.. main kaise mana kar sakti hun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul signs off papers for Arjun’s luggage that has arriv
