dialogues.text: Arrey yaar ye lock bhi toota hai??

dialogues.speaker: DELIVERY BOY
dialogues.text: Sir, I’m just a delivery boy. Aap belongings check kar lo, koi problem ho toh airline se baat kar lena.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Rahul opens the luggage to see a bunch of clothes messily packed, a couple of novels and a draft of Arjun’s unpubli novel. He takes it in his hand & reads the cover curiousl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harsh helps grand dad from the wheel chair into the car.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Rahul kahaan hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ghar pe. On their way back, Grand Dad’s playing with the I-pad.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Tune Selfie li hai kabhi?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nahin woh kya hota hai? Grand dad takes a bunch of selfies, Harsh laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 78 A small lawn outside the house has been decorated. Not fancy but with a lot of warmth and love - birthday balloo streamers and ribbons. Mother’s convincing Rahul to meet a girl.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Ek baar mil to le beta.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom.. Please. Mother calls The GIRL, late 20’s. She looks at Rahul with wishful eyes. She walks towards them.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hi. How are you?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aap log baat karo main abhi aati hun. Mother leaves so that they can spend some lone time toget

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: I’m Geet. Nice to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Hi Geet. Rahul. They shake hands. An Odd beat.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So.. Mom bata rahi thi.. Ahh.. Actually, mom ne zyada bataya nahin aap ke baare mein.. what do you do?

dialogues.speaker: GEET
dialogues.text: Main insurance company mein kaam karti hun.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (straight faced) Oh.. That’s interesting... interesting..

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER PART OF THE LAWN
dialogues.text: Tia enters the party. She notices Arjun standing next to Wasim. Wasim’s using his phone to take a picture.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Arrey yaar.. do minute baad le lena, mujhe bathroom jaana hai.  60.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Ek second bro. Tia walks up to them.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Hey. They hug.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Heyy-- So glad you came.

dialogues.speaker: GEET
dialogues.text: I like your sweater. Orange mera favourite color hai.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Thanks, magar ye Tangarine hai.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (looks at the preparation) Kya baat hai.. Kaafi mehnat lagi hogi!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Writer nahi toh professional gubare- wala toh definitely ban sakta hoon. While they are talking, Rahul walks in from behind but he doesn’t notice Tia.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dude, yahan se nikaal mujhe.. Mummy ne iss Geet ke saath chhod diya hai.. Paanch minute aur baitha toh pukka mujhe koi insurance policy bech degi..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Hey!!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (notices her) Heyy!! Wow.. umm.. Tum yahan kaise? Arjun’s a bit surprised.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ek second, tum dono ek doosre ko jaante ho?  61.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ya..Ya (conscious of what happened last night) Kal raat.. I mean.. Inke ghar.. Main.. remember the retreat project, uske liye main inhi ka ghar dekh raha hun.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: -- Ya, toh tum dono dost ho?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nahin, ye mera bhai hai!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (almost in her head) Ahhh.. Karan

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Rahul..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Ya ya.. I know.. Magar.. So.. ahh. Wow! Small world. In this moment, they all have a secret with each other - Kiss, A confession and An Infatuation!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ya.. Toh.. Kya logi? Can I get you something to drink?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Arjun, bro ye dekh!!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Haan ek second.. Main lata hun!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Sure! Arjun leaves to get her something. A moment.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Listen, Ah.. Kal raat ke liye... Sorry.. I feel so weird...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: It’s okay.. Main bhi actually--

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: I hope tum mujhe judge nahin kar rahe...  62.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Don’t be silly, maine bhi kaafi pee li thhi. I was so drunk!!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Main bhi.. Un momo’s mein definitely kuch toh tha. Rahul laughs.

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur tumhari girlfirend hai toh I’m sorry..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Listen, koi badi baat nahin hai.. just relax.. Shit happens.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Oh thank God! So we’re cool? Rahul smiles in agreement. From the bar table Arjun keeps an eye on them, Wasim help him with the beers. There’s a small counter frying fish w they are standing.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Bhai, jalne ki boo aa rahi hai.. Magar yeh fish ki hai yaa.. (sniffs close to Arjun’s bum) Oh teri! yahan se aa rahi hai! Arjun pokes him with a skewer. WASIM (CONT’D) Aaaoouuww dude, piles bro piles! Arjun walks up to Tia and Rahul with the beer.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: —-Here.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Thanks. The Car arrives.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (to Tia) Come.. Birthday boy se milein?.  78 63.

dialogues.speaker: CHORUS THE WHOLE PARTY SINGS ALONG.
dialogues.text: The montage’ is treated full of moments that would make f beautiful memory in the years to come, for all of them! * Confetti bursts - a couple of kids play with it. * A cake with 90 candles. * They all sing happy birthday and feed each other the ca * Grand dad pretends to die in the middle of a laugh. * Arjun and Rahul are happy that they’ve made him happy. * Wasim’s brother is doing weights by lifting a kid. * The oldies play rummy on a small table. * They take his wheel chair round and round. They walk up to a table where all the oldies are playing cards. Rahul notices Geet coming up to him and makes an e

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Daduu. . (grandpa turns) Ye meri dost hai.. Tia.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Happy birthday Uncle.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (gets a better look) Kabhi Hawaii gayi ho?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Nahin abhi tak toh nahin...

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Main jaa raha hun.. Chaho toh tumhe saath le ke jaa sakta hun..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Arjun, seekho kuch inse..What a gentleman. Dadu goes back to playing cards. She looks at his cards, are not very good but..

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya sequence hai..  79 64. Dadu looks at her as if she’s stupid, everyone packs thei cards..

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh I’m sorry! Grandpa realises what she’s done! He gets the pot.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Yahan beth, mere saath khel.. Ye le (gives her 10 rs) Goodwill...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Wow.. Meri toh lottery lag gayi.. Impressed with how easily she fit in, Arjun smiles..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (softly) Buddhon ko chuna lagaane ka iraada hai?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (winks ) Goodwill 10 rupay ki hai... Kitna chuna lagungi, 50 rupay ka?? Arjun’s walking towards the washroom, Rahul comes and pul Arjun from the elbow.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dude ek second baathroom jaane de-

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: --Tunhe inhe bulaya?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kinhe? Rahul points to ANU AUNTY, a pretty woman in her late 40'

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Anu Aunty!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nahin, main kyoun bulaunga. Both of them walk into the house.

dialogues.text: Father's finishing some work in the kitchen when the two enter.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dad, Anu aunty ko aapne bulaya?  65.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Kal toh Arjun ne bola “apne doston ko bula lo, more the merrier”.. Ab kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Pa.. Aapko party ki band bajani thi toh.. Kya yaar! As they are talking the mother enters with a big bowl of soup. She’s unaware of Anu’s presence at the party.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (to Arjun) Try kar.. Namak theek hai.. (looks at the father) Kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Rahul tu bhi try kar.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Better ho sakta hai.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa, aap isko theek karo.. Aur papa aap zara bahar aao na, woh dadu kuch mangah rahe thhe..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Haan, ye buns bhi bahar lete jao..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (takes them) Haan, sure.. Mother starts to go back to the kitchen just then..

dialogues.speaker: ANU AUNTY
dialogues.text: Hi beta. They all turn around to notice ANU AUNTY with a box of cookies.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Oh hi Anu Aunty! (tries to take her out) Aap dadu se mili? Aao unhein wish kar do..

dialogues.speaker: ANU AUNTY
dialogues.text: Unsein toh main baad mein mil lungi.. Maine socha pehle tum dono ko mil lun.. Here.. (offers them cookies) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: ANU AUNTY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arjun ki favoritest caramel cookies.. Mother is staring at father with anger but he avoids eye contact.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (takes a bite) Oh thank you. I love them.. Rahul looks at him with anger as if “are you stupid?”

dialogues.speaker: ANU AUNTY
dialogues.text: Pata hai jab chote thhe toh kaise bhaag bhaag ke aate the aur bolte the.. Anu aunty ek aur please.. Aur ab dekho.. Such handsome boys.. Touch wood.. (to mother) Hi Sunita, bahut acchi lag rahi ho.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Yahan se please chali jao!

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita, mehmaan hai, tameez se baat karo!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Mehmaan, my foot! (to Anu again) Niklo yahan se!
