dialogues.text: Tia and Grand dad have become buddies, they are on a winn streak.. They are playing teen patti with the card on the head variation.

dialogues.speaker: OLD MAN
dialogues.text: Cheating.. Yeh sarasar cheating hail

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Koi cheating nahin kar raha.. Khelna hai toh chup chaap khel le..

dialogues.speaker: OLD MAN
dialogues.text: Yeh jayegi tabhi khelega koi yahan pe.. Aur tu itna budha ho gaya hai ki tere ko ek bacchi ki madat chaiye..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (angry) Cake neeche rakh!! (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Chai le lo is se waapas.. Mere ghar mein, mujh se aise baat kar raha hai.. Cake rakh!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Uncle, koi baat nahin! Relax. Ye lo chaudhary uncle ye chaal main wapis le rahi hun.. bees rupay ki toh baat hai...yeh lijiye...

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HOUSE
dialogues.text: He starts

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (holding a glass bowl) Sunita agar ek aur baar kuch bola na toh main yeh yahin tod dunga..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (almost screaming) Haan todo na phir.. throw it!! Kisne bola tha ise bulane ke liye.. Hum ghar ka kachra ghar ke bahar rakhte hain, ghar mein nahin..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Maa, please aap--

dialogues.speaker: ANU AUNTY
dialogues.text: Harish, main jaa rahin hun, main yahan kisi ko sharminda nahin karna chahti.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Anu aunty, I’m sorry, main aapke saath bahar aata hun.. to take her out.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Tumhara deemag kharaab hai, dosoton se aise baat karte hain..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aur aise kitne dost hain tumhare?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Tumhein paagal khane mein hona chaiye, ghar mein nahin..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Papa.. Aap please mere saath aa jao.. Arjun tu mom ke saath reh. They walk out.  82 83 68.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE IN THE LAWN
dialogues.text: As father walks towards the lawn he sees a little commoti at Grand dad’s card table. He walks towards them to get a clearer idea of what’s happening.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Saale cheater!! He starts to take the money back..

dialogues.speaker: OLD MAN
dialogues.text: Ruk be.. Mere paise hain woh. Tia tries to help ease the situation a bit but it doesn’t help.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Ikka mera tha!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu kya kar rahe ho? Ruko ek minute.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Pehle patte khelna seekh.. Phir table par bethna..

dialogues.speaker: OLD MAN
dialogues.text: Har koi teri tarah juaari nahin hai... agli baar main bhi paanch ikke le ke aata hun.. Tu phir dekh..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Saale fokat mein cake aur chai pee raha hai.. Aur ab paanch rupay kya mil gaye.. Bhaag liya..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Choksi ka.. Aap zara idhar aa jaiye. Papa ki taraf se main maafi mangta hun.. Umar ke saath bacchon ki tarah behave karne lage hain..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Tu mera pota hai ke iska? Father’s talking to Anu and apologising to her a little f away.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE HOUSE
dialogues.text: Arjun fills a glass of water and sits next to his mum but he’s now desperately trying to control his pee.  84 85 86 69.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Mum.. Aap please promise karo aap yahin baithoge.. main bathroom se ek minute mein aaya. Okay.. Stay here. He gives her a glass of water and runs towards the bathro and shuts the door. Mother sits their breathing heavily. After a few seconds she looks at the box of cookies Anu A brought.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE IN THE LAWN
dialogues.text: The mother comes out of the house with the box of cookies The commotion on grand dad’s table is still on. She walks the way up to them and throws the cookies on to the floor Their dog comes running to grab a few.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Ye apni ghatiya cookies apne saath le ke jao..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita, main bol raha hun “wapas andar jao!!"

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aur main bol rahin hun ki aaj ke baad ye wapas is ghar mein aai toh mujh se bura koi nahin hoga...

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Is se bura aur kya banogi??

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (re: chowdhari kaka) Aadhe se zyaada cake dabaya hai! Saale bhukkad! Tia has no idea what’s happening but she knows it’s not g to go down well. Father tries to address some other guest INT. ARJUN’S BATHROOM - SAME TIME Arjun’s peeing and he can hear them screaming and shoutin He’s cursing himself and trying to rush peeing..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Papa aap betho.. Sunita!! The mother isn’t being able to control her anger. She pic up the cake knife lying on the table  70.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: What does she think by getting these cookies she’ll.. (beat) Bahar nikal, mere ghar se.. Bahar!! She waves the knife frantically in the air.

dialogues.speaker: BOOBLY
dialogues.text: Bhaiya main rokun kya?

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Tu please mere baap involve mat ho! Arjun walks out of the toilet only to find everyone screa and shouting at each other. The dog starts to BARK too.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (to mother) Maa, kisi ko lag jayegi.. Neeche rakho.. Maa.. (to Arjun) Tujhe ek kaam bola tha.. Paanch minute ke liye mummy ko andar nahin rakh sakta tha..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Itni der se rok rakha tha yaar, Kitchen mein hi nikal jaata.. Everyone’s screaming simultaneously.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Mere birthday par is gobar ko kyoun bulaya..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Chowdhary kaka main maafi mangta hun aapse.. Please-- (beat) Is ghar mein hum mehmaanon se tameez se baat kar sakte hain ya nahin!!!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (to father) Shakal mat dikhana mujhe apni--

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Mehmaan ki maa ki! Pandemonium. There’s an old man recording this whole thin a phone. Slowly the VOICES GET SUCKED OUT and we see all them from Tia’s point of view. She slowly begins to understand what Arjun was talking about. Only the DOG BAR can be heard.

dialogues.speaker: INTERVAL
dialogues.text: 85 85a 85b 85c 85d 86 87 71. * Lawn - The guests have left. Things lie scattered aroun * Rahul sits in his room, looks at Arjun’s luggage. His laptop screen has an incoming call from Skype. * Arjun chains up the dog. He walks into the house to see the bedroom doors shut. * Grand dad is lying on the bed looking at the Mandakini out which is kept not very far from his wife’s framed photograph. There’s a movie playing on the TV with a fune scene.. He looks at it with a sad smile.. * CU: A Mobile phone screen; a message from DAN the Publi reads ‘Haven’t heard back from anyone yet!’

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun sits on the sofa staring at the ceiling. News plays the television. Rahul walks in.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Muchads le chalega?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tu khud kab drive karega yaar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stand at a small Pan-Shop. Rahul pays the cigarette lights up the cigarettes and passes one to Arjun.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu ka toh pata nahin par baaki sab ke liye toh sahi surprise tha..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Do you really think Dad aur Anu Aunty?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Nahin yaar, Dad bahut kuch hain, par cheater nahin. Mom ko bas over react karne ki aadat ho gayi hai.. Geishu wanders around as they walk and sit on the pavemen

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Chod yaar, kuch aur baat karte hain.. Teri novel kaisi chal rahi hai? Koi publisher mila?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nahin, wahi purani bakwaas--—  72.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: --Kya?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Jo humesha kehtein hain, “lets have a happy ending”, “end mein achchi feeling aani chahiye” blah blah blah..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aur teri story?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Real hai.. aur real life mein koi guarantee nahin hoti ki end mein sab theek ho jayega.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: True. Tabhi toh hum woh khushi khaaniyon mein talaashte hain. Arjun takes a moment to ponder over this thought.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Hmm.. Kabhi kabhi sochta hoon ki agar graduation khatam kar li hoti.. ya woh stupid sa photography course poora kar leta.. Teri tarah over-achiever nahin hota but at least koi back up option toh hota..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Hey.. Trust me, Tu jaisa hai theek hai.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dude agar mom dad tujhe clone kar sakte toh main hota hi nahin.. (rahul chuckles) You know, jab main chota tha toh main yeh sochta rehta tha ki tujhme aisa kya hai jo mujh mein nahin.. Aur mujhe itne saal lag gaye ye janane mein ki this is who I am. (beat) Second best. I’m a runner up.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arjun.. Aise mat soch yaar..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Aur kaise sochu yaar? Apne aap ko dekh.. Ek successful novelist hai.. Entrepreneur hai.. Aur main.. (beat) Woh online job chodne ke baad ek part time bartender jo writer banane ki koshish kar raha hai..  73. This is the first time Rahul’s heard Arjun open up to him

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Hey. I’m sure is baar, it'll work out. (option - 2) Hey.. It’s hard struggle but I’m usre it’ll all be worth it.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: I swear agar is baar nahin hua toh ye writing ka qissa hi khatam.. Have to move on..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Listen, chahe toh main kisi publisher se baat kar sakta hun.. teri book padh ke kuch feedback de sakta hun ya

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ahh.. Main yahaan copy nahin laya.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ok. Help chahiye toh pooch lena. warna mom ko padha de, unka feedback surprisingly kaafi achcha hota hai. Arjun mulls over it and does a ‘maybe’ gesture. They star walking towards the car.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ek baat bata, tujhe Tia kaisi lagti hai?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mujhe toh bahut achchi lagti hai.. I mean (sleazy look) oomph...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (looks shattered) Oh!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (laughs) Relax Arjun, mujhe Tia mein koi interest nahin. So please make your move. Main already ek relationship mein hoon.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Saale tu usse ghumata kaise hai? Bina drive kiye?  88

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: I guess I’m good at other stuff.. Chahe toh tujhe kuch techniques sikha doon.. Arjun chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Chhod, aaj main tujhe kuch sikhata hoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun turns up the music, the car comes to an then sudden acceleration, Geishu struggles to

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Music kum kar.. you're distracting me-—

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Yeh khataara bees ke upar chalti hai. Chinta chhod accelerator daba.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Shut up Arjun. 74. abrupt stop & stay in place. At this moment another car cuts them and overtakes them . Arjun gets pissed off.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: What the-- (beat) C’mon, uss gaadi ko overtake kar.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arjun! Rehne de.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: C'mon, accelerator daba, daba, daba! Arjun reclines his seat and from the back seat brings out small circular thing that resembles a steering wheel. He holds it as if the two of them are driving the car togeth Rahul finds it funny.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yeh kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: --shhh, aaram se overtake kar... Arjun PUMPS UP the volume. Slowly their cars come paralle each other. Geishu BARKS at them through the window.  75. From the other car’s window it seems as if Arjun’s steeri left hand drive. ARJUN (CONT’D) (singing and grooving) ---song lyrics--- And suddenly Arjun does a fake swerve as if he’s going to crash into the other car.. SCREECH!! The other driver loses control and goes almost the road. Rahul and Arjun laugh their arses off!!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (uncontrollable laughter) Oh my God.. Oh my God... Uski shakal dekhi tuney!! But in this madness Rahul doesn’t see an oncoming car.. L call but he swerves.. too late.. the car plows INTO A TRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father stands in front of the car. The bonnet is half rai and the bumper half off.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (to Arjun) Garage mein hathoda pada hai. Ghar ki baaki cheezein bhi todh do... TV, Fridge, AC...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Meri galti thhi Dad. Mujhe gaadi chalana seekhna thha. Father can’t say much to him, irritated, he goes back in.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Bas? Yeh toh daantne ke naam pe insult thha yaar. Tujhe naalayak, nikumma aur gadha bolna toh bhool hi gaye.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arjun! Rahul! Dadu bula rahe hain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grand dad sits on his wheelchair. The entire family stand front of him. Grand dad is eating some left over cake fro the night before.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Yeh cake hai ya potty?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Aapne pehle potty khayi hai?

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Chup!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aapke diabetes ke liye sugarless cake banaya thha.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) Kal ke party ke baad toh sugarwala cake khake marna hi behtar hai. (a beat) Toh kal shaam ke liye kisi ko maafi maangni hai? (silence!) Theek hai, main hi shuru karta hoon... I’m sorry maine uss kamine Choksi ko gobar kaha. (beat) Lekin uss gobar ko invite kisne kiya thha? A few looks exchanged.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (raises his hand) Maine.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Sorry bolo!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: I’m Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (looks at Dad) Aur Anu ko kisne bulaya? He looks at Harsh.. An awakward beat or two.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu, actually woh idea bhi mera tha.. maine hi dad se kaha tha ki apne purane colleagues ko bula lein.  77. A beat as Rahul and Dad look at each other. Arjun is surprised to.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Aur mujhe nahin pata tha ki tumhein.. Anyway, I’m sorry tumhein itna bura laga toh aagey se aisa nahin hoga. I’m sorry.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Chalo bahi.. Puttar ji lao Ipad lao.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Ab kya kar rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Mera khilona hai ji.. Main jo karun.. Ek tasveer leni hai bhai.. Sab aa jayein..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: C’mon dad.. Kal kaafi nahin hua kya tasveer? Awkwardness. But they manage to do a weird half-hearted h

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Kaash babbu and family hoti toh puri family photo ho jaati.. He clicks the picture. Father walks up to him.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Aa raha hai aaj woh..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aur aapki family photo bhi jayegi.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Haan der na karna puttar.. warna kya pata main family photo mein aaun bhi na aaun.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Dad aap har waqt marne ki baat kyoun karte ho.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Marne se yaad aaya Rahul, tune meri dafnane ki jagah book kara di?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Ab ye kya nai cheez shuru ka di aapne?  92 INT. CAR — 78.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu aap.. (to Dad) Kuch nahin, inhen marne ke baad dafan hona hai.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Dad allow nahin kareinge, aise koi mazhab thodi badal sakta hai.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Mujhe pata hia puttar, Army ka open burial ground hai, Unhein service se matlab hai, mazhab se nahin.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Something.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (to Arjun) Aur tu eh duffer..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Haan ji?

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Tu aaj hi jaake meri jagah book kara le.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dad?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Dad!

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Ye dad dad kya laga rakha hai, marna maine hai ya isne.. (beat) Aur koi accha sa view dhoondiyo.. Teri dadi aur main date pe wahin jaya karte the..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Kahan jaa rahe hain?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Date pe.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Hawaii?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Us se bhi better.  93 94 95 96 79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Various tombstones and two little figures walking. Arjun Tia are at the graveyard and reading different tombstones

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Agar tumhara tombstone ho, toh tum us pe kya likhana chaoge?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Tia Malik. Boobly ke pyaar mein kurbaan.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Waise main bhi uski tarah chest hila salta hun.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Show. (he fails) See.. Nobody can beat him.

dialogues.speaker: OMIT
dialogues.text: INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - EVENING Rahul’s sits in front of his laptop trying to write.. He’ still stuck at Chapter 6.. Nothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They continue to walk through the cemetery and flirt.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: So Karan Arjun are becoming friends again.. That’s nice! (beat) I know, main Rahul ko itni acchi tarah nahin jaanti lekin phir bhi.. (beat) shaayad ho sakta hai ki tumhari aur uski novel ek jaisa hona sach mein ek coincidence tha. A quiet beat.. And for the first time he’s starting to ag with this thought.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Hmm. Ho sakta hai. (afterthought) Tum uski badi side le rahi ho.. You like him or what?  97 98 99 100 80.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Shut up! INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - EVENING Rahul looks around.. Drinks more coffee.. Listens to musi but no real inspiration

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun shows her a leech.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: No thanks.. I ate..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: By the way mere paas bhi tumhare liye kuch hai.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Kya? He starts to go down on one knee ..

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (laughing) What the hell are you doing? Arjun!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Will you.. He pulls out a phantom cigarette..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Aww.. How can I say no.. (pulls one out) Light? He gets up and mock lights it for her. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - EVENING Rahul gets up.. Picks up Arjun’s draft and starts to read  101 102 81.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Listen kal jo hua uske liye I am sorry.. Mujhe nahin pata tha ki dadu--

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: --Are you crazy.. I’m sorry.. Normally, meri family aise kabhi nahin behave karti-- (back paddles) Correction.. I mean “public” mein aise kabhi nahin behave karti..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Relax.. Har family mein ladai hoti hai..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Humari family mein kuch zyaada hi hoti hai..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: You should be happy ki tumhari family toh hai A beat, as Arjun looks at her. She nods.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tum apne parents ko bahut miss karti ho?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Toh.. Tum apne tombstone pe kya likhoge?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (thinks ) Aakhri baar likh rahah hun.. Ho sakey toh kahaani yaad rakhna

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Wow.. Thats impressive.. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - DUSK Rahul’s holding a pen in one hand and Arjun’s draft in th other. He continues to read it. There are small gestures smile and anxious eyes which show that he’s enjoying what he’s reading.  82. 103 EXT. TIA’S HOUSE - EVENING The car comes to a stop outside Tia’s house. She takes a moment before getting out.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Thank you for these!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: You are welcome...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Toh tum aur kitne din ho yahan?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Do... aur Tum? She raises four fingers.. They both know it’s not enough.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Do din aur ruk jao.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: It’s a tempting offer. (option-2) Aur waise bhi main soch raha tha Boobly se kuch tips le lun.. Maybe then I could impress you..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (laughs) I had a good time.. Thank you! Keep working on the chest shake.. She does the hand action.. He laughs.

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bye. They hug. 104 INT. TIA’S HOUSE - LATE EVE She feels a buzz from their evening together. She walks i her house. A small figure in a huge house and you can alm feel her loneliness. She sits outside in the Lawn, thinki about the evening, she and Arjun just spent together. Her phone rings, she answers the phone.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Hey.. (beat) Ahh.. Date pe thi. (beat) Ahh.. Kabristan pe.. (smiles to herself) Arjun ke saath. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (lies down on the grass) Abhh.. He’s really nice!! And main is waqt bilkul sober hun.. As she tells her, she also realises that she’s falling fo him. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - NIGHT Rahul’s still reading the draft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun parks the car outside the house. Music Fades out. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - NIGHT THROUGH THE WINDOW - Rahul sees Arjun enter the house and shuts the draft, not realising that he’s left a pen in it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun pulls out a towel and enters his bathroom. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - NIGHT Rahul walks up to Arjun’s room with a draft hidden under shirt. He opens the door to realise that Arjun’s in the bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks up to Arjun’s luggage and slides the draft betwe his clothes. The bathroom door opens.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kya dhoond raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mera ek shirt shaayad tere kapdon mein aa gaya hai.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Check karta hoon. In the BG, the DOOR BELL RINGS. Arjun shuffle through his luggage to see if it’s there. Just as Rahul starts to wal check who’s at the door.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey...  111 84. Rahul turns around.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeh hai kya?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Haan.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (calls out) Arjun! Rahul! Dekho kaun aaya hai! Arjun peeks out of the doorway...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Hey.. Chachu! They both step out into --

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Sashi Chachuu!!!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kaisi ho chachi? We meet SASHI CHACHA (54), a happy go lucky man with his gracefully aging wife - NEETU CHACHI (47) & their THREE K * AALIA(18): Perpetually on her mobile phone * SHARIC(15): Carrying his guitar in a gig-bag * ZOEY(11): holding a couple of books. Ad-lib greetings and hugs and comments on each other’s appearances. The following dialogues are quick and over- lapping.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Papa I’m so sorry hum pehle nahin aa paye.

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Cruise pe contact hi nahin ho paya.

dialogues.speaker: ALIA
dialogues.text: We missed your birthday party!

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Haan bhai kya birthday party miss ki tumne, meri toh Indo-China border ki yaad taaza ho gayi.. Arjun and Rahul enter some ad-lib greetings...

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Baaki ke bags kahaan hai?  112 113 85.

dialogues.speaker: SHASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Gaadi mein hi rakhe hai bhaishaab.. Didn't want to inconvenience you'll .-» Toh humne Elgin mein rooms book kar liye hai

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Bakwas! Tum sab yaheen rahoge! Aur kal sab ek family photo lenge. Arjun tera woh duffer dost aa raha hai na? Dharmu inke bags andar leke aa

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Haan bol diya hai maine. While Arjun calls Wasim ...

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Are you sure koi dikkat nahi hogi?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Bilkul nahi ... maine pehle se hi tum logo ka room taiyaar kiya hai. (beat) Dharmendar!! Bacchon ko coke-fanta toh de do na!

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Bhaishaab ek superb single malt laya hun aapke liye..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul and Arjun are sitting with the kids. Dadu slyly pic up a glass and gulps a sip.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Papa, kya kar rahe ho aap! You’re not allowed!

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: --It’s fine bhai sahab.. Ek chota sa sip thha... (to grand dad) Though I must say papa, I’m very proud of you.. aapne smoking chhodh di, bahut badi baat hai.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Discipline, beta discipline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toh boys aur kya chal raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Arrey bahut kuch.. Dadu ki party pe Rahul ki shaadi tai ho gayi.. Ek chai wali ke saath..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Haan saale zaroor!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Maa.. Rahul ne Geet ke liye haan bol diya..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neetu Chachi has slipped into a kurta-pyjama, she helps M in the kitchen as Dharamendra puts everything in differen dishes and bowls.

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (re:album) And look what I found in ..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arrey.. Haan.. Ye toh pata nahin kitni purani hain... (beat) Yeh taste kar ---

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (tastes a little) It’s delicious ! Timmy ko bolo na mujhe kuch mutton recipes bheje, Sharic just loves this stuff.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Haan, ussey bolti hoon email karne ke liye.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Aap phone pe kuch bol rahe thhe? Milenge toh baat karenge.. All OK?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Lambi kahani hai.. baad mein araam se baithienge.

dialogues.speaker: INT. KITCHEN- NIGHT
dialogues.text: Mum and Neetu pick up the bowls and exit  87.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (shouts out) Khana taiyaar hai! Sab dining table pe aa jao!

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (to Alia) Alia do minute phone rakh lo beta. Aaj kal Alia se baat karne ke liye ussey whatsapp karna padta hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POST DINNER: A few packets of duty free chocolates are be passed around. Sashi is licking the last bits off the pla Alia is scanning photos on her i-phone from the album.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Neetu tumne iss duffer ko badi choot de rakhi hai. Jab dekho cholestrol wala khana hi khata hai! Neetu gives Sashi a mock-angry look.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Papa, please aise jokes mat maaro, Neetu ka koi sense of humor hai hi nahin...

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Nahin mera matlab... (to Shariq) Aaj raat lagne waali hai tere papa ki..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Dadu aap sabki bas lagwate hi rehte ho...

dialogues.speaker: ALIA
dialogues.text: Pa.. Yeh dekhi aapne? Sashi takes the album. They all peek in and turn a few pa

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Bhabhi aap toh bilkul Waheeda Rehman lag rahi ho.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (blushes ) Kuch bhi...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: No mom, chachi sahi keh rahi hain.  88.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Par dad Guru Dutt kum, Amrish Puri zyaada lag rahe hain...

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (laughs) Aur Shashi ko dekho, exactly Sharic jaise lagte thhe!

dialogues.speaker: SHARIC
dialogues.text: Shee.. main aise thodi dikhta hoon.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Abe, tujh se bahut zyaada handsome thha main... yeh guitar dekh ke kuch ladkiyon kya pata li, khud ko rockstar samajh liye?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Haan Sharic tu nahin janta, Sashi aur mere liye liye ghar ke bhahar ladkiyon ki line lagti thhi.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Chup be, woh line mere liye thhi. More laughter. They continue to get more nostalgic.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Jo bhi kaho, woh din bade yaad aate hain...

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Un yaadon ko main karodon rupyon ke liye na bechun...

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Jhoota! Karodon ke liye toh tu potty bhi kha lega..

dialogues.speaker: EVERYONE
dialogues.text: Yuckkk!! Dadu, that’s just gross!! Arjun laughs.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Dus crore miley toh tum sab khaoge!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Chee papa..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Khana kha rahe hain papa. Father looks at a few pictures. Others continue with thei conversations.  89.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (to Sharic) Guitar pe kya kya bajata hai??

dialogues.speaker: SHARIC
dialogues.text: Metallica.. Megadeath.. Iron Maiden-

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Bas jhain jhain, jhoo jhoo...

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Kaan phat gaye hain bhabhi. Uff!

dialogues.speaker: SHARIC
dialogues.text: Aap logon ko music ka sense hi nahin.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ya bro they don’t understand...

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Chup be! Aaj se tere guitar lessons ke paise main tabhi bharunga jab tu purane hindi gaane bajayega... Rafi, Burman, Kishore kumar!

dialogues.speaker: SHARIC
dialogues.text: Nooo.. Papa..

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Kyun, Rahul bhaiya toh Hindi gaane bajate hain...

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: C’mon Rahul!! Aaj ho hi jaaye..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: --Haan, haan.. aaj kuch suna hi de.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (to Rahul) Aur ab Lata ji ki sureeli awaz meing hum sunenge-- Rahul shows Arjun the middle finger.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: --tere dad ka favorite..

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Wahi wala ... jo appne bhabhi ke liye sangeet par gaya thha.. Bhabhi kya naam thha??

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Nahin.. rehne do..  118 119 90.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: --Nahin nahin bhai, phir kabhi.. Mera gala..

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Arre Shuru toh karo. sab saath mein gayenge.. C’mon.. Bhabhi aap bologe toh mana nahin karenge.. They all try to cajole him.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: C’mon papa.. main taiyaar hoon... A beat. Rahul takes the guitar from Sharic and plays the opening riff... A little hesitation and then Father sings song.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Chaand si mehbooba hogi meri kab aisa maine socha tha. Haan tum bilkul waisi ho jaisa maine.. He continues to sing, everybody joins in.. They all begin have a good time.. Mum and dad exchange a few looks.. The are floating down memory lane again. This is the happiest we've seen them. It’s as if something has changed. Rahul Arjun share a look, knowing something eventful is taking place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s late at night. Only a couple of bulbs lit inside the house. Sharic and Alia help Dharmendra drag the luggage i the house.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Maine apne room.. umm Arjun ke room mein mattress laga diye hain, I hope tum sab fit ho jaoge.

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Haan haan .. aaraam se.. Thank you!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Good night. Chachi shuts the door, Rahul walks up to the mother and g her a hug, he’s happy with the way things have gone tonig

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Bade dino baad aapko itna khush dekh raha hoon.  120 121 91.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (smiles) Good night. INT. GRAND DAD’S ROOM - NIGHT Dimly lit room. An alarm clock shows the time - 11:24.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Chachi yeh mom ke liye layi thhi.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Aur kitni der lagake rakhna padega? Grand dad sits in the room with the face pack on. Arjun r the back of a small bottle.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: 15 minutes. (beat) Toh ab kya karein? Grand dad opens the bed side drawer and pulls out a doobi and plays some music on the I-Pad.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Daduuuu..Pitwaoge aap.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: --Shh, jala na.. INT. FATHER’S ROOM - NIGHT Mother enters the room to see that the father’s sitting o the bed looking through the album.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Yeh woh Srinagar ka skiing instructor jo baat baat pe tumhara haath pakad raha tha..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (chuckles) Gulmarg... Aur haat nahin pakad raha tha sikha raha tha..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Aur_ye.. (pic of Harsh in a towel) Waah.. Kya gussa aaya tha.. Mera poora suitcase hi phenk diya tha tumne..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kisne kaha tha..  122 123 124 125 92. He grimaces feeling a bit acidic.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (passes him a tablet) Kitni baar bola hai itni chocolates mat khaya karo.. Ye lo... INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - NIGHT Rahul’s brushing his teeth, chatting on Skype (on his pho with his earphones on.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yeah, you look great in those pictures. (beat) I don’t like it when Chris flirts with you. (beat) I can’t wait to see you too. He overhears SOUND of a GLASS breaking...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: One second.. INT. FATHER’S ROOM - NIGHT Only one night light is on. Mum and dad both lie in the b Mum is about to get up to check on the sound, but..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Kal subah dekh lena.. You need to relax.. Aaj bahut kaam kar liya tume.. Just wait. INT. GRAND DAD’S ROOM - NIGHT Arjun tries to pick up a broken glass from the floor.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Daduuu.. marwaoge kya??

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Darr mat yaar.. doosra cup de de. He passes the ash tray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul walks to Grand dad’s room. He sees some shadow play under the door. Rahul inches open the door to peek in.  126 127 128 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scared of him they quickly put the doobie on the ash tray Rahul enters, sees the smoke and the doobie. Grand dad an Arjun both point at each other to blame.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (deflects the smoke) Arjun, ye dhoop bhuja ke bahar rakh de beta?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Issey kehte hain topic change? A beat and then Rahul walks up to them and then picks up doobie and takes a drag. Grand dad pats him on the back a though he’s proud of him! The brothers laugh. MUSIC SEEPS INT. FATHER’S ROOM - NIGHT Mum and dad both lay in bed. Mum turns towards him, reali he’s already been looking at her.. warmly and more husban like than ever. A beat. They talk in hushed voices.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Agar tumhe Timmy ka catering business shuru karna hai... toh I’1l support you. She smiles. He takes her hand in his. INT. GRAND DAD’S ROOM - NIGHT

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Bas, ab uss Anu ke cookies mil jaate toh...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Munchies... They all laugh..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Yaar, judge mat karna, magar main soch raha tha ki... There’s pin drop silence.. Everyone looks bombed... ARJUN (CONT’D) 10 crore ke liye... main potty ka ek tukda toh kha hi sakta hoon.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Yuck Arjun that’s disgusting! They all burst out laughing.  129 130 131

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Bakwaas! Mujhe lagta hai tu 5 crore ke liye bhi kha lega...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ahhh..Shaayad, magar phir sandwich ke andar..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Chee!

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Kya chee chee kar raha hai, agar sandwich mein cheese hoga toh tu bhi--

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Cheese ke saath toh main ek crore mein kha lunga.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Aur agar kisi ko pata na ho toh-

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Agar kisi ko nahin pata aur sandwich mein cheese ho toh, haan, main dus crore mein kha lunga.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Yuck Rahul!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Tu paison ke liye potty khaega? They all laugh. Through out this scene, the characters ar stoned and giggling. INT. FATHER’S ROOM - NIGHT The lights are off, we see a silhouette of the parents together in bed.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Hum tab itne khush the na.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The brothers step out of the room and shut the door. INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - LATER Rahul changes into night clothes while Arjun lies in bed. Only a side lamp is on. They are both stoned and drifting into sleep.  132 133 134 95.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu yeh maal kahaan se laye hain? Fuuuuck man!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Saale tu jitna perfect banta hain utna hai nahin. Tu Mom dad ka favorite bana kaise?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom dad hum dono ko equally pyaar karte-- (bursts out laughing)

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (chuckling) --Kaminey, seedhe mooh toh bol de.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: You know what... main teri jagah ek second mein le loon...

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Yeah right...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arrey jitne taane maar lein, atleast woh tujhe jaante toh hain. Mujhe toh woh jaante bhi nahin. Arjun’s drifting to sleep .. A beat and --

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tujhe ek baat bataun. jo iss ghar mein maine kisi ko nahin batayi. He looks at Arjun who has already drifted into a contende sleep, then he picks up the guitar and plays a couple of chords. MUSIC FADES OUT..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s early in the morning, A LIGHT DRIZZLE. Father lets Geishu free to take a morning walk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mum looks at herself in the bathroom mirror, adding a tou of make up (kaajal) for the first time since we’ve seen h INT. FATHER’S ROOM - MORNING Father is combing his hair, She enters.  96.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Family photo ke liye tumhari jacket nikali hai...

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Ah.. Thanks. She hands him a cup of tea.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Main gaadi zara garage deke aata hun, Sashi kahaan hain?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Rahul ussey property dikhane le gaya hai. 135 EXT. TIA’S HOUSE - DAY It’s an OVERCAST DAY. Chacha, Rahul, Arjun and Tia all st at her porch.

dialogues.speaker: CHACHA
dialogues.text: Achchi jagah hai, tumhare liye perfect hoga Rahul...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ok Tia.. tumhare uncle se baat kar lo... paperwork shuru karte hain...

dialogues.speaker: CHACHA
dialogues.text: Tum se milkar achcha laga. Tia’s phone rings and she excuses herself.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Tu nahin aa raha?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Main.. aata hoon... Rahul gives a knowing smile and drives off. In the backgr we see Tia on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Oh Thanks, thanks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mum’s tying a beautiful Saree in front of the mirror whil talking on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Nahin Neetu ke liye woh bhuna ghosht ki recipe.. Accha email bhej diya?? Main check karti hoon.  97. She makes her way to Rahul’s room and crosses the LIVING where Grand dad is ready much in advance for the photo sh and Neetu Chachi is getting her kids clothes ironed.

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (to grand dad) Papa, aap toh already ready ho gaye?

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Aur nahin toh kya, aaj photo mein nahin aaya toh agli baar haar chadha ke aana padega... 137 INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - DAY Mum walks into the room, Sharic is on the PC, so she deci to use Rahul’s laptop instead. The other two kids run aro in the background, Neetu Chachi tries to control them.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (into the phone) Haan.. main check kar rahi hoon one second... yahaan net slow hai. Mother opens up the internet browser.. Chachi enters. She carrying two options of dresses.

dialogues.speaker: CHACHI
dialogues.text: Wow, bahut pretty lag rahi ho.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Thank you! The computer screen says ‘loading rahul.kapoor@gmail.com.

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (holds up two dresses) Kaunsi waali?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chacha and Rahul are driving back. He notices something..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Ek second, gaadi rokna. Chacha stops the car. Rahul looks outside one more time.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Chachu aap chalo, (gets off) Woh.. main bhool hi gaya.. ek dost se milna thha mujhe..  98.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Main wait karta hoon!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Nahin nahin.. aap chalo na, main aata hoon.. He shuts the car door and from his POV we see his dad’s c with a broken bonnet parked outside a house. 139 INT. TIA’S HOUSE - KITCHEN / LIVING AREA - DAY

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (on phone) Thank you so much. Haan maasi se baat ho gayi, unhone subah wish kiya thha. Thanks for calling. Bye!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Ek second.. (beat) Aaj tumhara birthday hai?

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Haan.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Seriously?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Happy Birthday T! (hugs her) Pehle bataya hota toh Boobly ka cut- out le aata. She gives a faint smile. He can tell she’s a little off-m

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya baat hai T? Thoda toh excitement dikha do, it’s your birthday!

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Actually, Aaj mere parents ki fourteenth death anniversary bhi hai.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Oh.. I’m so sorry. 140 I/E. ANU AUNTY’S HOUSE - DAY Rahul’s outside Anu Aunty’s house, next to his DAD’S CAR. dials a number. The conversation intercuts:  141 142 99.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kidhar ho aap?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Garage pe. Aadhe ghante mein pahunchta hoon. Rahul cuts the call; shattered and angry at the same time

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE
dialogues.text: Anu aunty walks up to the father

dialogues.speaker: ANU
dialogues.text: Kya ho gaya hai tumhe?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin.. INT. TIA’'S HOUSE - DAY Arjun and Tia are in the bedroom. She’s sitting on the be and Arjun on the edge of the bed. She takes

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Mera thirtheenth birthday tha aur Mom-dad Chachu ki surgery ke baad Canada se wapis aa rahe the.. (beat) Aur do din tak Chachu ne mujhe bataya bhi nahin kyounki abhi tak bodies nahin mili thi.. Jab woh mere birthday par wapis nahin aaye toh main itna naraaz ho gayi ki maine gusse mein bola ki accha hoga ki agar mere mom dad ho hi na.. (tears up) Mujhe thodi pata thha ki... a moment.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Hey. it’s okay...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Flight lene se pehle unhone call kiya thha mujhe... maine theek se baat tak nahin ki... ulta lad padi. (beat) Har birthday wahi phone call yaad aata hai.. aur sochti hoon ki unhe kya kya bol sakti thhi main.. ki I miss you.. I love you.. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: TIA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur agar zindagi mein main sabse zyaada kuch bhi chahti hun toh bas yahi ki kaash woh yahan hote.. She breaks down. Arjun embraces her.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (his eyes well up too) I’m so sorry.. really.. EXT. ANU AUNTY’S HOUSE - DAY Rahul walks up to the door waits for a moment and then RI the BELL. A beat later, Anu Aunty opens the door, on seei him, she nearly jumps out of her skin.

dialogues.speaker: ANU
dialogues.text: Oh.. Hi beta.. yahaan kaise?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dad andar hain?

dialogues.speaker: ANU
dialogues.text: Nahin.. Woh aaye the.. Magar.. Rahul politely pushes open the door and walks in, praying deep within that his intuition is wrong.. And then throug half open door, he looks inside the bedroom, where his fa is sitting on the bed. The father looks up, freezes for a moment.. It’s too heav moment for either of them to react. A beat and then Rahul just turns around and leaves. INT. TIA’'S HOUSE - EVENING Tia has stopped crying and Arjun’s got her a glass of wat They look into each others eyes for a few beats. It’s a q moment of deep connection. He holds her hand. Kisses her the forehead. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: I really like you. She realises this could go somewhere. Arjun’s phone RINGS says - DAN - PUBLISHING AGENT. Without giving it a second thought, he cuts the call.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: One second..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tia’s washed he face and stands in front of the mirror introspecting. She opens the door, he stands right outsid  101.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Arjun.. before anything else happens, mujhe tumhein kuch bataana hai.. and please judge mat karna.. I was drunk..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wasim is setting up a frame for the family photo. Grand d waits eagerly while the three KIDS help align the chairs the frame. Rahul walks in.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Rahul! Ye dekh maine inhen kya sikhaya. Grand dad mock shoots all of them one by one (the way we’ the hospital before) and they all pretend to die. Rahul d give much of a reaction and walks in.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arrey kahan ja rahah hai idhar aaja.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Dadu, main kapde badal ke aata hun..

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: (to his assistant) Barish hone wali hai kya?!!

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (throws something at him) Manhoos saaale, chup beth!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul walks straight towards his room. From another room:

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (calls out) Rahul! Sharic ke liye tumhare paas koi tie hai kya??--

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: --Haan, main dekhta hun chahi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mum sits quietly; seems to be in some kind of shock. She hears Rahul’s voice from her room.  102. 149 INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - DAY Rahu shuts his door and takes a moment to gather his thoughts.. Geishu is sitting on his bed.. The mother ente the room holding his laptop. He tries to avoid her and starts to find something in his luggage..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa, zara 10 minute do main change kar ke aata hun.. (notices the laptop / takes it) .-Thanks! (to Geishu) Geishu chal hat.. He tries to look busy, she shuts the door behind her.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: --Tu mujhse kuch chupa raha hai? He wonders if she knows about Dad. He slows down.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aapko pata hai dad khana hain?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (exasperated) Topic mat badlo, mere sawaal ka seedha jawaab do Rahul! He realises she doesn’t know yet. He contemplates whether tell her but then:

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa mujhe aap 5 min. do main aa raha hun.. Aur geishu ko le ke jao..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tumhare laptop pe woh kiski pictures hain? tumhari girlfriend ki toh nahin hain! He freezes for a split-second..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (scrambles) Aap mera laptop kyoun dekh rahe ho? Aur mujhe nahin pata aap kya bol rahe ho..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Really? Please ab do minute ke liye yahan se jao maa..  103.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (segue / re: Geishu) .. Aur geishu hat yahan se... C’mon get up!! He directs his anger towards the dog and shushes him off.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tumhari girlfriend ka naam kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (shouts) Maa. Aap mera laptop kyoun check kar rahe ho!!???

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (rising voice) Meri aankhon mein dekh aur bol joh tasveerein maine dekhi hain woh sach nahin hai!! She blocks him against the wall.. His phone RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (caged wanting to escape) Ek minute mujhe ye call lene do..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: --Pehle mere sawaal ka jawaab do rahul! She snatches his phone away and looks at the caller’s nam Disgusted she throws the phone on the floor and slaps him he’s taken aback..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kab se jhoot bol rahe ho hum sab se, haan? (she slaps him again) Koi girlfriend nahin hai teri.. You disgust me! Humare baare mein kuch toh socha hota.. Dadu ke baare mein.. Papa Ke baare mein..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: --Trust me, Papa koi doodh ke dhule nahin hain.. kya bata ke gaye hain ki woh garage mein hain? Great! Toh shaayad maine jhoot bolna unhin se seekha hai.. A beat and then Chachi opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: CHACHI
dialogues.text: Tie mili Rahul? Both Mum and Rahul try to be nonchalant.  104.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Haan.. Main dekh raha hun. He exits..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father sits in the car parked outside the house he finall gathers the courage to go in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grandad is making Wasim take solo pictures of him.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: (to chacha) Ye dekh.. Neetu ka face pack laga kar main kya chamak raha hun.. Lag raha hun heroine ya nahin.. Ab meri twacha se meri umar ka pata hi nahin chalta

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Ab kya bolun aapko dadu.. Itne hot lag rahe ho, agar meri dadi zinda hoti na.. toh pukka aap dono ki setting kar leta.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Teri maa toh zinda hai na? Father walks straight in avoiding any conversation. Chach family is all ready for the shoot.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to the father) Jaldi kar jaldi.. Aur sab ko bula.. Hum sab ready hain..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul steps out of Chachi’s room only to notice his dad walking into the bathroom.. Before dad could shut the doo Rahul walks in.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom ko bola ki aap garage pe the?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (shuts the door) Mujh se ek baar baat toh kar leta?  105.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: You're unbelievable.. Kitne ghatiya insaan ho aap. He punches the wall in anger partly at his father and par because of himself.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Rahul.. I’m sorry--

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Haan zaroor!

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Rahul, Itna aasan nahin hai sab kuch samjhana.. Main Sunita ko.. The mother opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (eyes welling up) Kidhar te tum? Rahul realises Chacha’s not standing too far from them, Chacha calls out Harish, he steps out..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (whispers) Maa. Please. Chacha is here..

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Okay.. Baarish pukka aane wali hai.. Baccha party fatafat sab ko bula ke aao..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Areey yaar.. Kya manhoos din hai.. (to the kids) Jaldi jao bulao sab ko.. All the kids run in to call out everyone.

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (to Wasim) Magar Arjun kahan hai??? Use phone karo na.. Wasim starts to dial his number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aalia runs up to the bathroom, Zoe follows..  156 106.

dialogues.speaker: AALIA
dialogues.text: Wasim bhaiya keh rahe hain ki hurry everyone.. Baarish aane wali hai.. hurry.. Hurry.. Hurry.

dialogues.speaker: ZOE
dialogues.text: Badi mumma.. Come.. Come.. Hurry up.. Jaldi se photo leni hai.. Zoe start to pull her and realise she’s been crying.

dialogues.speaker: ZOE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aap ro rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOUND OF DISTANT THUNDER.. Can they pull this one off??

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Arrey arjun phone utha saale..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Jaldi aao sab.. Jaldi.. Jaldi.. fatafat khade ho.. They all start to step out one by one and take their positions... Arjun enters, not in the best of moods.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Arj.. tu phone hi nahin utha raha yaar.. Jaldi aa.. Wahan Rahul ke saath khada ho! (to his assistant) Jaldi, woh soft box ready rakh.. Quick minor adjustments of the frame. WASIM (CONT’D) Okay everyone get ready.. Arjun- Rahul India pakistan ka border nahin hai nhai.. Paas aa jao.. Aur thodi si khushi bhai family photo hai.. (beat) Harish uncle aunty pe haath rakh lo.. Aap hi ki wife hain.. Abhi toh padosi ki lag rahin hain..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Bakwaas! Padosi ki wife toh bahut hi hot hai.. Father takes a moment and then he does. Mother’s ready to erupt any moment but she holds it all in...

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Okay.. Smile everyone..and..  107. Wasim presses the shutter button.. It clicks once and sto Something’s not right.. WASIM (CONT’D) (to his asst.) Arrey battery badal gadhe.. Aur uska dimmer bada!

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Sabki bateesi dikhni chaiye... Chalo smile..

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Mumma susu aai hai!

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: Zoeyy! Rush She rushes in. The mother shrugs father’s hand off her shoulder..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (softly) Anu ke yahan the?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita.. Ek baar ye khatam ho jaaye.. Main tumhein sab bata dunga.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Okay.. Almost ready.. Rahul looks at Arjun..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Tujhe kya hua hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Kuch nahin!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Toh itna chidda wah kyoun hai..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: --‘Kyoun ki tu dinya ka sabse kutta insaan hai.. Assistant has fixed the battery.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: Okay Camera ready hai.. Okay ready? (to the father) Uncle Aunty pe haath waspis rakh sakte ho!

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Haan katengi nahin.  108.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Tu Sunita ko jaanta nahin hai!

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHAHCHA
dialogues.text: -- Aise.. (hugs Neetu) Sharmao mat bhai warna hum sab phir se Chaand Si Mehbooba gaa sakte hain..

dialogues.speaker: NEETU CHACHI
dialogues.text: (calls out) Zoey!! Come hurry! Chacha, Chachi and Grand dad laugh. Dad slowly puts his h around mum but she’s had enough, She shuns his hand away.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (exhales ) Bas bahut ho gaya..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (hushed voice) Sunita.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (walks away) Koi zarrorat nahin hai is happy family ke naatak ki..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa!!

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Kya ho raha hai bhai? Sunita.. Kahan jaa rahi hai? Baarish aane wali hai. Harish!

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Main baat karta hun ek minute..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kya chahte ho? Sabke saamne khush dikhein? Photo chaiye toh aise lete hain..

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Bhabhi bhabhi--

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Kya ho raha hai harish?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (keeping it under control) Paanch minute do papa.. Aa raha hun  109. Father walks up to the mother, slightly away from everyon They talk in hushed voice:

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita.. Please..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kyoun darr lag rahah hai sabke samne asliyat pata chal jayegi..

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita.. Ek baar ye khatam ho jaaye, dono beth kar araam se baat kar lenge, I promise.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tum Anu ke yahan the ya nahin?

dialogues.speaker: LAWN
dialogues.text: Chahchu is about to leave.. Rahul stops him..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Chachu main jaata hun..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Harish!! Wapis aa..

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Arjun kya ho raha hai?

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: I have no clue! 153c DRIVEWAY :

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Aaj ke baad wahaan kabhi nahin jaaunga, I promise.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kitne samay se chal raha hai ye sab?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita, Main.. Confused tha..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: --Kitne time se?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Teen mahin-- (can’t lie anymore) Ek saal se.  154 155 110.

dialogues.speaker: LAWN TO DRIVEWAY
dialogues.text: Rahul walks up to them. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa please..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Choo bhi mat mujhe.. Tum donon ek jaise ho - bilkul jhoote.. Main hi bewkoof thi--

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: --Sunita baat samjhane ki koshi karo She starts to walk back, he holds her by the hand.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Nikal jao ghar se. Get the hell out of here.

dialogues.speaker: WASIM
dialogues.text: (to his asst) Boonda baandi ho rahi hai.. Light ko andar rakh..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Ruk do minute.. (shouts out) Rahul.. Kya ho raha hai? Grand dad starts to come towards teh driveway, Rahul goes back to stop him. Arjun walks up to Rahul.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe koi kuch bataayega?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: kuch nahin, tu bacchon ko le ke bahar ja..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (shouts) Mujhe ghar ka naukar samjha hai kya? Kuch bhi hota hai toh bahar ja.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (raising his voice) Chilla kyoun raha hai??

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: ‘Kyounki is ghar mein sab kuch mujh se hi kyoun chupaya jaata hai!!  156 159 111.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: --Koi kuch nahin chupa raha--

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Really.. to tune Tia ko kiss nahin kiya?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: (exasperated) What bullshit man! Arjun! Bachchon ki tarah rona hi hai toh kahin aur jaake ro! Arjun pushes him, Rahul falls on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: You know what.. You guys can shoot this photograph without me.. Cause nobody really cares if I’m around!

dialogues.speaker: DRIVEWAY
dialogues.text: Father’s in the car now.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sabke saamne hi ladna chahti ho toh theek hai, main jaa raha hun Father walks towards the car.. Mum follows..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Haan jao please.. Jao! Jhoote ho tum.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Haan galti ho gayi.. Sorry.. Magar tumne kabhi jhoot nahin bola kya. She weeps profusely.. It starts to RAIN.. The chance for family picture is blown! She just turns around and starts walk back in. Father sees her leave for a beat and tehn s to driveaway. She stops for a moment to get to stop her s from crying..

dialogues.speaker: LAWN
dialogues.text: As she walks back in, Rahul realises dad’s going to drive away. He gets up..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Papa kahan jaa rahe hain? Mother ignores everyone and walks straight towards her ro Sashi comes up to Rahul.  160 161 162 112.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Main Neetu ko bolta hun woh bachcho ko hotel le jaye.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Main mom se baat karta hun. Rahul follows mum. Grand dad’s pissed off with everyone f keeping him in the dark.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Kya lagta hai tum sab ko? Drama sirf tum hi kar sakte ho! He kicks a chair in anger. Wasim, just about manages to s his equipment.

dialogues.speaker: SASHI CHACHA
dialogues.text: Papa.. Wait.. Kya kra rahe ho!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother sees Rahul enter the house and bolts the door befo he can step in. He takes a moment turns around..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul goes AROUND THE HOUSE to enters through a connectin door / window to the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rahul enters the room. They look at each other and then s looks away. In this unguarded moment they both have gotte over their temper and speak softly.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Please chale jao yahan se.. Mujhe aaj ke baad tumhari shakal bhi nahin dekhni.. He goes and sits next to her.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Maa!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tu mere saath aisa kaise kar sakta hai? Oh my-- (beat) Itne saalon se jhooth bol raha tha tu?  163 164
--Aapko mere jhoot bolne ka gam hai ya meri asliyat ka?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tu mera perfect baccha tha Rahul..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aur ab nahin hun? Maa main humesha se yahi tha.. Aur yahi rahunga.. Sirf aapko malum nahin tha.. (beat) Thak chuka hun apne aap se.. Aap se door bhaag ke.. Aur is perfect bacche ke tag se.. nahin chaiye mujhe.. Main jo hun, woh hun.. (beat) Jhoot bolne ke liye sorry hun.. Aapko dukh pahuncha sorry bol sakta hun.. Sab chupane ke liye sorry bol hun.. Magar apne hone par bol sakta usek liye kuch sakta kaise maafi maangu mom.. Yahi hun main.. This.. And I can’t say sorry for this mom.. I can’t...

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (breaking down) Maine kyoun aisi galtiyaan ki, ki tum, Arjun, tumhare dad sab mujh se itne door chale gaye.. Bhagwaan mujhe maaf nahin karega..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aap ne kuch galat nahin kiya mom.. So please... INT. ARJUN’S ROOM - EVENING Arjun walks to his room. Starts packing his luggage, He p out a t-shirt and a towel, his draft falls out with it. A picks it up, a pen rolls out of it.. A beat as he realise this is Rahul’s pen.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: .». aur main aapko humesha khush dekhna chahta hoon mom.. main jo hoon aapki wajah se hoon.. «meri book, mera career sab kuch..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Mujhse bahut badi galti ho gayi..  114.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kis baare mein.. Aap kya bol rahe ho mom? THAK.. THAK.. She takes a moment..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tumhari novel ke idea ke baare mein.. THAK.. THAK.. THAK.. Arjun’s knocking furiously at the do Rahul walks up to the door and opens the latch and Arjun pounces on him right away.. Arjun whacks him..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Pehli baar dhoka diya utna kaafi nahi thha tere liye?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kya bol raha hai.. They tumble to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arjun ruk jao! Mum wants to stop the fight but is afraid to get too clos The following dialogues are exchanged as they fight.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: You backstabber..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (rushes to the door) Sashii!!! Sashi!! Pandemonium, screaming. Ad-lib. Sashi rushes in. He strug to pull Arjun off. Mum and Dharamendra also try to restra them.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Chhodo mujhe mom.. Ye ek number ka jhoota hai saala.. (to Rahul) Chor saale.. Mera draft pad raha tha.. Phir se, story chura raha tha na meri.. They finally manage to pull them apart, Grand dad walks i

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arjun, maine tera draft sirf isliye padha ki teri madad kar sakoon!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Arrey apne agent se pooch le! Woh call kar raha hoga tujhe!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arjun stop it!!

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Arrey aap toh sach jaante ho na. Yeh pehli baar nahin hai ki ye mera idea chura raha hai!

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom.. Please isko batao ki woh idea..

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (to Arjun) Maine hi tera idea Rahul ko diya thha Arjun... Things start to slow down.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mom, magar aapne toh- A beat, the moment finally sinks in. She starts to breakdown...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother walks out into the rain.. Arjun comes up to her.. knows, it’s time to confess...

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arjun, mujhe laga ki tu kitaab ke baare mein serious nahin tha.. Har chhe mahine baad life mein kuch aur karna chahta tha.. College chhod diya.. Phir 3 mahine likhne ke baad photography course karne chala gaya.. phir bola adventure sports mein interest hai.. (beat) Mujhe laga ki writer banana bhi tere liye bus ek shaukh tha.. Rahul comes out too..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: (incredulously) -- Toh aapne..  166 167 168 169 116.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Rahul itne saal se kuch likhne ki koshish kar raha tha toh maine socha.. I’m sorry Arjun.. I’m really sorry! Tears rolling down her cheeks, she tries to hug him.. He moves away..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Sorry.. se kuch nahin hoga mom.. Sorry’s not good enough. Arjun leaves. We follow him as he walks out of the house, emotions course through him. Rain pouring down. Mum turns around to look at Rahul for some support but he just turns around and goes back in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mum enters, wet from the pouring rain, tears streaming do her face.. Her eyes are drawn to the father’s jacket lyin the bed. She picks up the phone and dials a number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RAIN is coming down in sheets now, and there is a sha CLAP of THUNDER. The phone lying on the navigator seat rings a few times. Father looks at the screen - it says HOME. The WIPERS move back and forth. Our view is blurred by th RAIN, Father picks up the phone. We SEE a strong headligh approaching from the left

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Sunita, I’m-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TRUCK comes CRASHING in... We don’t see the full crash time, instead:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We HEAR the IMPACT through the phone.. MUSIC FADES OUT. E SILENCE. Just her face. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father lies on the operating table unconscious, breathing tubes are attached to his mouth. SURGEONS and NURSES move around him talking in medical terms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole family sits -- dazed -- in the waiting area.. Florescent lights HUM. -- OMIT -—-

dialogues.speaker: WAITING AREA
dialogues.text: Early morning day light streams into the waiting area. A opens, they all look over. A DOCTOR walks over to the gro They all wait for him to say something...

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: I’m sorry. A beat as the mother puts her head in her hands in disbel her legs wobble and she breaks down. They are all shatter

dialogues.speaker: MUSIC SEEPS IN., (PBS - 4)
dialogues.text: * The family wanders out -- dazed -- the news is still sinking in. It all happened so quickly.. * At the hospital reception, Rahul signs all the formalit papers and is handed over a box with some belongings. He opens it to see his dad’s wallet which has a family pictu of all of them together - something he probably picked up from the album the other night. * In Sashi’s car, on his way back, the Grand dad breaks d He stops the car and tries to console him. * The Funeral - As the ceremony takes place, a complex se of emotions pass over everyone’s faces - love, grief, disappointment, resignation and regret. * Tia stands next to Wasim but Arjun doesn’t talk to her. * Neetu Chachi embraces the mother. INT. ARJUN’S ROOM From the doorway, Rahul watches Arjun pack his luggage.  174 174a 118.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Aise hi chala jayega.. Bina kisi se baat kiye. Arjun doesn’t respond.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Mom ko humari zaroorat hai Arjun.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Mom ko humari nahin tumhari zaroorat hai. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Mujh se toh woh baat bhi nahin kar rahi.. Aur shaayad kabhi nahin karengi.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Nothing you can do will ever disappoint her. Arjun continues to pack.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: What if I told you I have lied to her my whole life, and I’ve no interst in Tia or any other girl for that matter? A beat as Arjun looks at him and tries to process this information. His eyes start to well up.. Arjun wants to s something but not sure what..

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You don’t have to say anything.. Just stay back a little longer..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: I can’t. I need sometime. Dharamendra enters.

dialogues.speaker: DHARAMENDRA
dialogues.text: Taxi aa gayi hai.

dialogues.speaker: THE MUSIC, (PBS)
dialogues.text: * Arjun’s in a taxi, overwhelmed with everything that has happened in the last few days. * Rahul sits down alone in Arjun’s empty room, Geishu com and puts his head in his lap.  174b 175 176 177 178 179 119.

dialogues.speaker: LEGEND
dialogues.text: EXT. ARJUN’S AGENT OFFICE - DAY Arjun enters a building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DAN, ARJUN'S AGENT sits opposite him and seems to be very impressed with the progress on the novel

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: (looks at the book) It reads so good.. Yeh bestseller hai, I can feel it! Main tera advance organise karvata hun. INT. RAHUL’S BOYFRIEND’S HOUSE - DAY In a cozy suburban house, Rahul cuts his birthday cake. H with his boyfriend and boyfriend's family. It’s a warm fa and they’ve all accepted each other for who they are, Rah notices this but he seems a bit lost. He checks his phone willing it to ring. After a moment or two he types ‘maa’ and contemplates if should call her.. but changes his mind. He’s torn. His boyfriend puts his hand on his shoulder to show support. The family lovingly raises a toast, Rahul puts his smile on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mum’s in the kitchen with Timmy Maasi. We see BOXES of fo lying around that says ‘Timmy’s catering’.. Timmy maasi is on the phone taking a catering order. At t end of the phone conversation she hands mum some cash.

dialogues.speaker: TIMMY
dialogues.text: This is the advance for Saturday. Mum takes the cash and puts it in the locker, which also the same picture which was found in dad’s wallet. PBS ENDS.  120. 180 INT. RAHUL’S APARTMENT - NIGHT The e-mail signal blinks on Rahul’s i-pad, he taps it. It video from Grand pa, surprised he opens it. 181 INT. ARJUN’S APARTMENT - NIGHT Arjun also opens the attachment, the following video mess intercuts between the two of them watching it: 180a I-pad Video: Grand pa looks into the lens, he looks significantly older than last time.. Or maybe just sadder

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Hello. Kaise ho? Main theek hoon. Mandakini ke videos dekhte dekhte thak gaya thha toh socha tum dono se baat kar leta hoon... ab waqt pe toh bharosa raha nahin. (beat) Rahul iss naye ipapad ke liye thanks, uss manhoos khoon choosne waali machine se definitely better hai. Arjun, at least gems toh bhej deta duffer. (beat) Aaj kal neend hi nahin aati yaar. Doctor kehta hai 91 hone ka side effect hai. Doctor ko kya pata, 91 hone ka sabse bada side effect toh yeh akelapan hai. (beat) Bahut akela ho gaya hoon.. Tumhare dad ke jaane ke baad... jeeney ki ichcha jaise khatam hi ho gayi hai. Warna main toh century maar leta. Par ab nahin lagta ki ho payega. (beat) Badi yaad aati tum dono ki. Roz tumhare papa ki tasweeron ko dekhta hoon toh... (eyes start to well up) Waise kabhi mom ko phone kar liya karo... Woh acting achcha kar leti hai par main jaanta hoon... roz raat ko roti hai... Tum dono toh bhaag gaye... ab waheen akeli sab kuch dekhti hai.. (beat) Toh kya hai ki... main tumse waheen maang raha hoon jo mere paas nahin hai... thoda sa time... Galti toh sab se hoti hai.. Par apni family ko aise nahin chodte beta.. kabhi nahin.. Bas ek aakhri baar ghar aa jao tum dono... aur kuch nahin chahta main...  182 183 184 185 121. RAHUL and ARJUN have also got teary eyes now.

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pata nahin iske baad shayad zarurat bhi na padey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tia’s phone beeps - it says “new meesage” from an America number. She reads it. Bunkoo and Sahil sit next to her. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sashi Chacha and his family are over. They all sit around table making small talk. The DOOR BELL RINGS. Sharic open the door. Rahul and Arjun enter the house, feeling strange. Ad-lib greetings and hugs. Grand dad has a big smile on his face tears in his eyes. Mother acts stoic but she’s wrecked. She doesn’t get up a stays seated, keeping it all in. Finally their eyes meet. Hurt, sadness and regret run acr their faces.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Go meet Dadu..

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. DADU’S ROOM - MOMENTS LATER Arjun adn rahul enter Dadu’s room. He wakes up and loving hugs them both. (ad-lib - they tell him to rest) and then

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD
dialogues.text: Kal subha sabko ikatha kar ke mere paas le ke aana.. Okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arjun enters his room to be surprised that it’s been re-d Almost how it would have been in the past. He looks aroun and feels nostalgic and finally looks at picture of their family that was taken by Dadu on their last trip.  122. 186 INT. RAHUL’S ROOM - NIGHT Rahul’s changed into his night kurta pajama. He’s unpacki his luggage when Mum shows up at the door with a water bottle, she places it on the side table.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Thanks maa. (awkward beat) Kaise ho?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Theek hoon. A quiet beat as none of them know where to start.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: I missed you. She chokes up and just nods her head. He takes her hand.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yahaan baitho na. She sits on the bed, he sits next to her. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tum kasie ho?

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Theek hun.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aur woh.. Tumhara.. She doesn’t finish her sentence.

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kaun.. Bolo maa.. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: I'm sorry...

dialogues.speaker: RAHUL
dialogues.text: Kyunki aap uska naam nahin bol paaye.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Nahin, kyunki mujhe aur thoda waqt lagega. He gives her a side hug, she’s glad he’s back. We let the share this personal moment and dissolve into:  187 188 189 123.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sit opposite each other.. Nobody says anything for a and then after a moment it starts to Rain outside.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Mujhe laga tum aaogi nahin.

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Mujhe laga tum phone nahin karoge. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: T you know, dad ki death se pehle main tumhara dard samjh to gaya tha, magar aaj mehsoos bhi kar paa raha hun...

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: (holds his hand) Hey.. I know how you feel..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: Apnon se door bhaagte bhaagte thak gaya hun main..

dialogues.speaker: TIA
dialogues.text: Toh laut aao na.. Sab yahin hain.. Jahan the.. They look at each other..

dialogues.speaker: ARJUN
dialogues.text: I missed you.. They kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother enters her room to find a copy of Arjun’s first published novel’s draft on her table. A small post it not that dedicated the novel to her.

dialogues.speaker: DISSOLVE TO
dialogues.text: EXT. LAWN —- MORNING It’s a sunny day. We slowly tilt down to the door. Rahul opens the door and the family steps out one by one. We se what they see: Chairs have been lined up for the photoshoot once again a Wasim’s assistant is setting up the frame.  190 124. The family looks at all this preparation with a strange s of Deja vu, hurt and anxiety. It brings back memories fro probably the worst day of their lives.. .» But ironically, this moment also brings with it a chan to fix things! Slowly, everyone comes and takes their respective positio Rahul and Arjun come stand next to the mother.. Who’s fin it hard to control her emotions and nervousness. Grand dad sits in the centre and Chacha’s family around h Then, Grand dad signals someone off screen to bring something. Music slowly begins to pick up. Tia and Wasim walk in with a tall cut-out wrapped in newspaper. They all look at it with anticipation.. Maybe even know what’s in it. They unwrap it - and we reveal, a life-size standee of th father. Mum’s eyes are welling up. .- And just like that, the family realizes this is it.. T is the moment to forgive, to let go of the past, to reconnect. Arjun holds Mum’s hand tight and Rahul kisses her on the head. She looks at them with all the love she’s been curb deep inside. She’s sobbing, all the pressure, resentment anger she’s felt seeps out of her. She hugs them both tig and they both hug her back. Trapped in a loving embrace, feelings rise up, unbidden a overpowering everyone. Finally, a calm sets in, the hug breaks apart. A smile an then everyone looks into camera..

dialogues.speaker: GRAND DAD, (V.0)
dialogues.text: .-I finally got the photograph I always wanted. It wasn’t perfect .. but then neither were we. We see the whole family together and the father’s standee between.
